name: Nicole Finley
text: LOVE the staff at JBD! Tammy, Mark, Santana, Zach— they’re all phenomenal!! I can’t walk in without leaving with something in my (or on my) hands! Such beautiful, unique pieces of jewelry and I get the most compliments on ALL of the time. And can NOT beat their prices. Highly recommend- if you’re looking for a piece or want to design a piece, Jewelry By Design should be your FIRST stop!

name: Lauren Kiskunes
text: Absolutely wonderful staff! I brought in a 15 year old necklace with a broke clasp and they fixed it on the spot in less than 5 minutes. Highly recommend

resp.text: Hi Lauren, thanks for your positive review! We are so happy that you allowed JBD to help with your special piece. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Madeline Morrell
text: Make sure you ask for your total for ALL work being done. I was being told prices for one, not the total for both. And have them circle and clearly state the quoted price before signing! It felt extremely sketchy and you're stuck when they surprise you with the true cost at pickup! I will never come here again. Poor communication and subpar customer service.

resp.text: Madeline Morrell Stewart, thanks for your feedback & your mailed letter. We set a high standard for ourselves in serving our clients & we're sorry that this was not met in your interaction with our business.  We strive to be as clear & transparent with itemized pricing on our service envelopes detailing parts, labor & totals along with a detailed description of work to be done as to remove any chance of surprise at pickup.  Regarding your visit, we created two separate envelopes because we provided two different services, one pair of earrings with 18k protector backs & specialty posts & one pair of earrings with 18ky screw posts & screw backs.  On each envelope, we included an in-depth description of parts & labor needed to complete your job along with the total.  Each envelope had a total written & differing totals ($257.10 & $300.70) due to different mechanisms.  We DID obtain your signature on each envelope as acknowledgement & confirmation of the details regarding the services BEFORE we proceeded.  We understand that your complaint is that our 10 yr. sales professional, Santana, did not give you "the grand total verbally".  It is very typical for a client that may want to pick up their services independently from one another, i.e.:  $257.10 one week & the $300.70 the next week.  Although we may have fallen short with "verbally" providing you with the grand total, we were completely transparent with our detailed written description & totals for each signed envelope.  We do value you as a new customer as well as your other family members & hope you will reconsider visiting Jewelry by Design in the future.

name: Leah Smith
text: Wonderful staff and customer service! They are so kind and helpful and want their customers pleased. Beautiful work and jewelry!

resp.text: HI Ms. Smith. Thank you so much for your kind words & sweet review! Thank you for your business & we look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Patty Gleeson
text:
My 1.5 ctw wedding ring was appraised at 1.24 ctw by jbd. My 2 ctw tennis bracelet was appraised by jbd at 1.45 ctw. My 5 ctw aquamarine pendant was appraised by jbd at 3 ctw. No mention of the need to remove stones to receive an accurate appraisal when I brought my pieces in. Needless to say the low carat weights greatly lowered the appraised value of my pieces. The appraisals were finished a week late. No courtesy call to let me know they wouldn't be ready on time. I called multiple times upon the scheduled ready date and after to check in on their progress. I finally
requested that they call when the pieces were ready. Overall an extremely disappointing experience. And unfortunately the appraisals are virtually worthless.

name: Jack Hopkins
text: I brought a newly purchased watch in to be refitted & the experience was first-rate. Met three of the employees & they were extremely friendly & professional. Would definitely recommend them & their service.

resp.text: Thanks so much for kind words!  We appreciate you choosing Jewelry by Design & look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Megan Miller
text:
Walked in with a dream idea and heirloom jewelry and happily now wear a one of a kind engagement ring. They have beautiful jewelry but their custom work, as their name states, is where they can really work some magic and shine! Also, can we talk about their entire staff! Friendly, warm and welcoming, loved the whole experience!
Thank you! -The Brigham's

resp.text: Thank you so much, Megan! :) So thankful we were able to help you with your vision!

name: John Leclair
text: My fiancee and I always use JBD. They are the most professional, kind, and helpful jewelers we have ever had the pleasure of working with. There was a loose stone in her wedding band the day before our wedding and they promptly helped us to get us on the road in time. If you want great service and wonderful quality jewelry, go here!

name: Christopher Ward
text: Quick and easy watch repair

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Ward. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Katherine Haywood
text: This place is wonderful!!! They made a custom kayaking pendant for my mom for mothers day!!! They made it in a timely manner and it is stunning!!! I highly recommend this place!!! Picture quality does not show the amazing job that was done.

name: Margaret Tramell
text: I had a great experience! They were helpful and quick and made sure I was happy.

name: Crystal Landcaster
text: The customer service here is WONDERFUL! I simply cannot speak highly enough of this store! I brought in a family ring I inherited and wanted to melt it down and create a new right hand ring. When I went in, I had absolutely no idea what I wanted it to look like, I just knew I wanted a right hand ring. Other places I have been to, I would walk around and just look to get ideas, and people would get very frustrated with me or just ignore me. When I came into Jewelry by Design, and told them I didn't have any idea of a style I wanted, they were so helpful and patient and were excited to work with me and show me different pieces. It was actually fun working with them! Not to mention, being a part of the entire process and seeing it be created from beginning to end. It also made me feel so much better that they do everything right there in the store, they don't send anything off unlike other places in town. They also scoped my diamond with me to show me how to identify it so I knew it was my same diamond when I got it back. I will always recommend them to everyone! I am always treated like family when I walk in the door, I just love the feeling of a small town "local jeweler" I absolutely LOVE this place!

resp.text: Thank you so much Crystal! We truly enjoyed working with you and are so glad we got to be a part of the memories of your special ring! Creating new designs is our passion and we love to include our customers in the entire process; from beginning to end. We hope you are still enjoying your ring and we highly look forward to seeing you again soon. Thank you so much for the sweet words!

name: Greg K
text: I have purchased several pieces from Jewelry By Design over the past year and a half. I have been extremely satisfied with both the quality of the jewelry, as well as the amazing customer service. One of my purchases was custom made from a sketch. Owners Mark and Tammy are very approachable and helpful with all my questions and needs. I have never felt pressured into a purchase by any of their associates, and I find them all very easy to work with. This is a wonderful local company with an amazing inventory. I highly recommend you drop by to make your next special occasion truly unique. Nothing against the other guys, but I have found the best overall service at Jewelry By Design.

resp.text: Thank you so much Greg! We appreciate you so much. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Michele Irions
text:
My husband and I ordered a ring for our six year old son to give to him on our wedding day. They were able to fit the entire inscription on the ring and it turned out great. The employees were very friendly and worked with us on what we wanted.

The only reason I didn't give this place 5 stars is because it took longer than we were told for the ring to come in. It may not have been something they could have changed and it worked out fine. I was impressed with this place overall.

text: I went in to repurpose a ring that was passed down to me.  I’m beyond thrilled with the setting that will now hold the stones from the passed down ring.  The staff, Kelsey, was an amazing help.  She had great ideas and made sure that I got just what I wanted.  I can’t wait to get the finished product so I can post pictures of it.  Thank Jewelry By Design!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Hill! We truly enjoyed working with you on your beautiful ring and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Carleen Amadio
text:
I know I came to the right jewelry store after I walked in and had my meeting with Zachary. Saying I was totally blown away by the time I left is putting it mildly!! Zac, Thank you for all your help during our meeting last week and how you handled in all my needs from the mechanical watches that needed repairs, to the numerous sterling silver rings, bracelet that needed to be fixed, enlarged and one needing a stone replaced in one ring, to creations you will be designing for me with the 5 Ruby Zoeite Stone pendants for my Daughter and 2 Sister and myself to be created, to the ring and pendant with the Alexandrite (raw and cut) stones I brought in, that will be done in rose gold.
Sending you the photos of the wedding rings I have in storage, that will be recreated for me with chocolate and diamonds awaiting for me to see the design.
And finally to the 3 strands of pearls and raw black coral to create a 3 to 4 strand necklace that Santana will be doing for me!! Let your creativity fly, and looking forward to seeing you soon. Thanks again for today!! I have found the perfect jeweler for all my future needs. The possibilities are so endless and there s more to come and could not be happier with spending over 4 hours going over everything with you!
Saying incredible is an understatement!! If anyone is looking for one of a kind jewelry, “Jewelry By Design” is the company to go to and you will not regret coming here! I walked away feeling absolutely confident I made the right choice! Definitely a company you can trust! Can’t wait to be dazzled by what you’re making for me and repairing for me! Outstanding Customer Service 100%!!

Carleen Amadio

name: Alex Vroom
text: I am not a person that typically writes negative reviews but this was an experience that had to be shared. I walked into Jewelry by Design with my custom made, one of a kind engagement ring. It has 4 bands that meet in the back. My engagement ring had cracked where the bands meet and one of the bands had broken off. I still don’t know how it happened but I was devastated so I took it in to get it repaired. I took it to Jewelry by Design because of all the great reviews and because the original jeweler was now retired. When I took it in, the service was great and I also asked to resize down 1/4 size because it had been fitting loosely. My first indication that something wasn’t right should have been when they didn’t check to see if they agreed that I needed it resized. When I came back for my ring, I could no longer put it on my finger after only going down a 1/4 size and they had bent the bands causing the halo for the diamond to be out of place. It no longer looked like the same ring and the setting for the diamond was crooked. I went back to them the next day and explained that I believed somewhere in the resizing process/repair that some of the bands looked a little out of place and asked if they would be able to fix it. I also brought a picture of the ring to show how it looked originally. The jeweler at this point was incredibly rude and even asked if the picture was of the same ring. I then explained to him that it was and stated again that this was a one of a kind ring and that it did not look like the picture and also didn’t fit. He then proceeded to tell me that I had not needed to get it resized in the first place and didn’t understand why I had gotten it resized. He also said that he had only done work in the back so anything that was messed up in the front was not his doing. He walked away at this point and his sales rep picked up the conversation asking if we wanted it resized. I said yes and that I would like it fixed to look like the picture. She relunctantly asked me to send the picture to the store email. I was charged more for the resizing than I had been originally and they told me it would take a week to resize it. I should have at this point taken it elsewhere but I wanted to give them a chance to fix their mistake. A week later I got a call in which the jeweler said that he had gotten it “as close as humanly possible to the picture.” He also said that the ring was unstable and that it needed additional structural support insinuating that it was poorly designed. My fiancé picked up the ring and much to our disappointment and frustration it looked nothing like the picture. The 4 bands had originally been crossing and now they were parallel to each other. On top of that they removed the 14k gold stamp from the inside of the band. I hope that doesn't mean that they used some other metal when they resized it. I don’t know how he thought that it looked like the picture. I have shown several friends and family members the before pictures and what it looks like now and they all agree that it’s not even close. To make matters worse he added tacks to the ring saughtering the bands together. This was not part of the original design nor had we asked for it and he never called to ask before he modified the ring. The jeweler was again very rude to my fiancé when he picked up the ring making comments about how the design was unstable and insinuated the damage to the ring had been some how done by my fiancé between leaving the store and giving it back to me 10 minutes later. We believe that our poor treatment was due to our college age and that the piece was from another jeweler. The jeweler who had created our ring had designed most of my family’s engagement rings, had been in business as a family for over 80 years, and was highly respected as a master jeweler for his unique design and pieces. So to anyone who has jewelry designed by another jewler or who is young do not go to this establishment because they are extremely arrogant and have no respect for you or your jewelry.

name: Mikayla Perkins
text:
DO NOT TAKE YOUR RING TO GET RESIZED HERE.
I took my ring to be resized on July 24th and I was told that it would be ready by August 4rd. All I brought in was a simple wedding band. It is now August 17th and every time we call and ask about it they give us a date that they guarantee it will be done and then it isn’t. My wedding is this Saturday August 21st and if I would have known this was going to be this big of an issue I would have taken it to a local jeweler. I’ve had much more detailed rings done in 3 days and they have taken almost a month to complete this ring. They did not tell me when I took it in that they ship it somewhere else to get resized other wise I wouldn’t of let them because it is my grandmothers wedding band and I don’t trust it being shipped because things can happen. I am furious. DO NOT SHOP HERE!

text:
DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THEM. They do not care about their customers and obviously don't care about their ratings. My husband bought me a ring that needed sized. Was told i would have it back in 2 wks. It turned into 4wks. I got the ring back, my brand new ring, scratched up and the engravings were so messed up you couldn't read it. I was NOT happy. Know what they said? We will send it out again to get fixed, it'll take 4wks. I know it'll turn into 6wks if not longer, if they don't lose my ring or mess it up once again. No compensation on my end for their screw up either.
Think that's all they did? Nope. Paid a large payment down. It wasn't showing on the account that it was paid at all...even though they took the money from my account. Over a week later and everyone at the store is rude. Anyone in the phone is rude. Well, can you give us your card number? Well, you have that already because you took the money from my account. What's your banks number? Are you kidding me? Been on the phone 5 times and at the store 3 times...still isn't fixed. They are trying to pocket $500 without letting it reflect on my account and that will not happen with me.

Trust me...do not ever even walk into this place

name: Libbie Russell
text: What a wonderful experience I had when I went to Cloverdale Jewelers in Millbrook. I was greeted with a smile and a friendly hello. I went in to get a piece of jewelry repaired. I was told it would be ready by Friday. Boy was I surprised when I received a call the very next day saying it was ready. When I went to pick it up I was surprised to see how gorgeous my ring looked. They had cleaned and polished it along with replacing a stone and a prong. The price was very reasonable. So if you are looking for a jewelry shop locally that has amazing jewelry and a friendly staff you can not go wrong with Cloverdale Jewelers.

name: Patricia Jordan
text: I went to see Rick with some old jewelry I no longer wore & some rings passed down to me that I knew I'd never wear. I explained I have never worn a specific wedding band because over the years I've never found one that I adored enough to wear every day. Most look "typical" and I've happily worn the few pretty ones I've collected. I didn't know what I wanted,  I just knew what I didn't want. After a couple of discussions, Rick helped me realize, I had a ring from years ago that meant everything to me... the first ring my husband ever gave me. He suggested we "create" that same ring but with more of a commitment look. I couldn't be happier with the result. I had tears in my eyes when he handed it to me! Who knew the little ring I was given as a promise of hope from the beginning would mature into a lifelong dream that I can someday pass on to our only daughter!! Thank you so much for your patience and ability to realize what I really wanted all along!! I can't keep looking at it and smiling!!!! ❤

He sized my ring in only a day, so no month or longer wait to get my ring back. He gifted me with ring cleaner just because he was considerate and nice when he did not have to. Its a great place and if I ever need jewelry or jewelry repair I will definitely come back to this man's store each time.

text: They shipped out the order and arrived two days earlier than promised with a hand written Thank You! on the receipt. Very nice.

resp.text: Thank you Jeanette, glad your order came earlier than expected. And many thanks for the kind review 💗😊

name: Katelin Wilkins
text: What an amazing experience! I was so sad to drop my engagement ring off. It is a family piece and I didn't want to part with it long. I dropped it off on Monday morning and had it back on my finger 2 days later. They not only cleaned and buffed it, but they replaced prongs, took it down nearly 2 sizes and gave me a measurement on the carat weight of the center diamond. The fit is perfect and I could not be happier! Thank you so so much Diamond Jewelers!

resp.text: So happy you are pleased Katelin. We appreciate you💝

name: Maves Youngblood
text: The place was packed! Standing room only! And, yet, I was immediately greeted, directed to the right person and assisted. Professional, speedy and fairly priced. What else can you ask for? Great experience.

resp.text: Thank you Maves! I’m glad we could serve you in a timely manner. We appreciate you being patient? It does get a little busy 💝

name: Guelph Ontario
text: Have always had a great experience with Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores. Today was not. I will not return to Diamond Jewelers ever again. I did not enjoy the rude and condescending attitude Daphne exhibited towards me. I’ve never been treated that way in the past. But I’ll tell you it was enough to put me off from ever spending any of my hard earned money there again. Do yourself a favor and drive to Manning Jewelry in Foley. The staff there was beyond friendly. I’ll be doing business with Manning from here on out. Diamond Jewelers might need a little refresher on customer service.

resp.text:
I'm saddened to read this, in no way whatsoever did I realize that I was being condescending. This is my family's store and I'm so grateful to everyone that comes through the door. I truly did not mean to come across in a negative way that was not my intention. I want to offer you a $50 gift card from me.

My deepest apologies

name: Patty King
text: Such sweet people. I think it was “Lorrie” who helped me the last 2 visits. She is so kind, professional, and knowledgeable.  She greets me with a welcoming smile as soon as I walk in the door.  One of the tiny stones had fallen out of my sterling silver ring that I’ve had for months, and Lorrie made sure to get it fixed in just 2 days (so I would have it for my trip out of town). Just wonderful!  I will always be a Diamond World customer. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you Patty! I appreciate the sweet compliment. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: Jennifer Clough
text: Absolutely love Diamond Jewelers.  Had my engagement ring sized and it fits perfectly.  They also shined and puffed it and it looks amazing. Definitely will be using them in the future for all my jewelry needs. Stephanie is very sweet and super professional.

resp.text: Thanks Jennifer!! It was so nice meeting you & that precious Lennox!! We appreciate you coming in!! Enjoy your pretty ring! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Jackie Wireman
text: I had to return a product that I purchased a few months ago they were so pleasant with no questions gladly gave me a new product and it was a great great visit I would go there anytime for anything they stand behind all their products what more can you ask for I would recommend their beautiful shop to everybody Jackie Wireman

resp.text: Thanks Ms. Jackie!! We always love our visits with you! :)

name: Debbie Walters
text: Wonderful experience. My Apple Watch band got stuck on the watch. Took it in and the Jeweler was able to fix it right away. While I was waiting I inquired about a tennis necklace pendant. The ladies were so helpful. They found the tennis racket pendant and also helped me pick out a one really nice chain. Will definitely keep going back. Everyone was so pleasant and helpful.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Debbie! Thank you for the kind words

name: Megann Steege
text: I will definitely be returning to Diamond Jewelers! Top of the line selections, and the staff was amazing. Jeff Goodman went above and beyond to make my experience one to remember.

resp.text: Thank you Megann, you’re  the best and we appreciate all that you do for our city

name: Debbie Phares
text: Found the perfect item. Diamond Jewelers had a good selection. Lorrie was very friendly and helpful. The jeweler will have our item ready in a day or earlier.  To get personal attention, fair prices, and great service visit Diamond Jewelers first.

resp.text: Thank you Debbie! We are thankful you chose us. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: D Kirkdoffer
text: Stephanie is one of the nicest sales persons! Her sweet spirit is contagious!  And she is very knowledgeable of fine jewelry. Thanks to her we will visit again.

resp.text: You are the sweetest! Thank you for the kind words. I love where I work and you make my job extra special. Sorry for getting this message so late 💝

name: Missy Tyler
text: I stopped in to have links removed from a Tag watch. Although I spent very little, the staff treated me like a dear friend. That is typical of this lovely shop. We love Diamond Jewelers, especially Lorrie!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Missy! We love our sweet customers & appreciate you coming in!! Take Care! Lorrie

name: Blake Rowell
text: Fantastic service at every turn. You can’t go wrong here.

resp.text: Thank you Missy, we really appreciate the kind  words 💗

name: Maureen Crawford
text:
Very friendly and helpful people! We were visiting from Illinois. Our small town no longer has a full service local jeweler, and we needed a ring cut off, a replacement earring back, and some pieces cleaned. Ours was not a high ticket purchase, but we were treated as if it were.
They have some beautiful pieces, and a beautiful store!

resp.text: Maureen, that is so sweet! Thanks for taking the time to message the generous comment, please come see us again 💕

name: Cyndie Pankonien
text: I found this store from an ad they had in a travelers station when we were passing through. I contacted them about Pandora charms they had for their area & ordered some for my mom and myself. She has since passed away and this was the last trip we took together.  I noticed my dangle on my charm was missing. I called as soon as I noticed it. They were so kind to send me a replacement charm at a discounted price. I highly recommend this business!! Thank you Diamond Jewelers for helping me to keep my memory keepsake!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the sweet personal message, hoping you have the best New Year ahead and may you be blessed with much joy!

name: Shane Smith
text: Always, very friendly and helpful.

name: Debra Tarr
text: Always the best service and quality!  Picked out a beautiful necklace for my nieces high school graduation. Amazing staff and amazing service. I will be a regular forever :-).

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Debra!! It's always good to see you! I know your niece will love her necklace! We appreciate you & love some Rita's!!! :)

name: Yessicaa CohRin
text: They are always welcoming with a smile! Love the pandora section my girlfriend gets me rings for every holiday from there! I had a stone fall out and they replaced it within a day! Very good prices and well worth the money!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind comment. We appreciate you choosing us!

name: Annette Ross
text: Wonderful shop! As always, Lorie was a "jewel "!  Have made several purchases and plan to make more in the future! A hometown atmosphere that is hard to beat! A great staff! Thanks for always making me feel welcome!

resp.text: Thank you Annette! We appreciate the kind words!

name: judy blair
text: I I purchased a very nice Pandora charm at Diamond Jewelers in Gulf l Shoes, Alabama today. The girl who waited on me was very familiar with their Pandora merchandise. The store had  Pandora charms for both Gulf Shoes and Orange Beach. Their prices were very reasonable. I will see them next year for another charm.  I think you should check them out!

resp.text:
Mrs. Judy,
Thank you so much for your kind words! I enjoyed helping you with your Pandora charm! I hope you enjoy it, and we look forward to seeing you next year! Don't hesitate to call if you need anything at all!
Sincerely,
Mary Kathryn

name: Courtney Steffek
text: Fantastic service, warm, caring and professional staff! Great place to trust with your valuables.  LOVE LOVE LOVE these people!

name: Barbara Killam
text: I love Diamond Jewelry!!!!  Lorrie and the sales staff are so sweet and helpful!  I try to purchase all my Pandora bracelets and charms from them!  They have the best selection!

resp.text: We love you Barbara and always look forward to seeing g you and catching up. 💜

name: Nancy Shawhan
text: Super friendly staff, always willing to go the extra mile to take care of customers!  Love, love, LOVE Diamond Jewelry (the store, not actual diamond jewelry... well, wait... love that too. So, I actually love both Diamond Jewelry and jewelry with diamonds.). :)

name: Tina Dalton
text: I am new to Diamond Jewelers and have found my jewelers.  My engagement ring and wedding set are gorgeous.  The staff is fabulous and such a pleasure. We will go nowhere else.

resp.text: Your the best Tina! We had so much fun with you today! Hope you guys have the best New Year!

name: Dale Mikkelsen
text: Love Diamond Jewelers. Love everything I have purchased. The owners and employees are awesome! My favorite jewelry store! 😊

resp.text: Thank you Dale! Lots of love sweet friend 💝

name: Sarah Forbis
text: A big thank you to Dawn and the jeweler for their quick and thorough attention to my wedding band (accidentally stepped on and bent). They were able to fix, replace the diamond lost and polish up in less than 24 hours at a very competitive and fair price.  Thanks so much for your help!

name: Kim Edgerton
text: Beautiful store and excellent service always!   The staff is always very friendly, helpful and patient while I browse around looking for just the right items!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us Kim, We hope you have a  great Thanksgiving with your family 💕

name: Bill S
text: Awesome service! Very reasonable prices!

resp.text: Thank you Bill! Hope to see you again soon 😊

name: Connie King
text: We have used Diamond Jewelers for a couple years! Very professional staff and helpful. Stephanie has always gone above and beyond to meet our needs. I highly recommend them for whatever your jewelry needs are!

resp.text: You are so sweet Mrs. Connie! I enjoyed helping you and Tony! Hope to see y'all again! Thanks so much! Stephanie

name: Stacey Wilson
text: Most genuine, sweetest folks! They have a huge selection of gorgeous jewelry at all different price ranges. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: You are so sweet Stacey!! Thanks for the kind words!

name: Lafondraetta Lanier
text: Lorrie was knowledgeable and very helpful. I’ve had my Pandora bracelet for years and haven’t purchased new charms so I was really happy for her experience. There were lots of choices for me to choose from and there was a sale going on. I highly recommend this store.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lafondretta!  It was a pleasure meeting you and I hope you will come back and visit us when you're in town!    Kindest Regards, Lorrie

name: Sue Carol
text: The associate was awesome! She recommended some beautiful jewelry, one that I did purchase. Also had links removed from a new watch which they did right away! Highly recommend this jewelry store!!

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Sue!! I hope you're enjoying your jewelry! :)

name: Sandy Dobrzynski
text: I was looking for Pandora charms and earring hoops.  They had both and a very helpful sales  lady helped me out.  When I got back to Wisconsin I immediately put them together and absolutely love my Orange Beach bracelet. ( May have to get matching charms for my earrings too)

resp.text: Thank you Sandy! Congrats on your Pandora purchase and please let us know if we can help you in any way. Check out our website...you can order online and we will be happy to ship you anything.

name: Janice Murphy
text: My very first Pandora purchase couldn’t have been better! Lorrie was wonderful and endured my endless, newbie questions with warm, friendly professionalism. Our stop at Diamond Jewelers was fun and informative. We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Janice, I thoroughly enjoyed your visit, and was so happy to meet your friends, as well!  Please come back to see us when you're in Gulf Shores....and don't forget to call me with your Wish List!

name: Lenora Neal
text: I purchase a Pandora Charm each time we take a vacation.  Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores has  great selection of Pandora Charms!  Their staff is very friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind word Lenora 🦋

name: Kimberly Ray
text: Always a wonderful experience at Diamond Jewelers! Everyone on staff - Daphne, Dawn, Lori, Mary Kathryn & Stephanie are so welcoming and easy to work with. It only took 10 minutes from the time I went in until I had picked out what I wanted, had it rang up, paid for and wrapped beautifully. Thank you ladies for all of your hard work!

name: Kyle Sparks
text: I just went in to the store to see if they sold engagement ring boxes. The one I have is very noticeable when in my pocket. They only sold ones with their name on it. They were very professional in telling me so. As I walked back to the parking lot the lady flagged my back down and brought me 2 very nice boxes that she was able to find and wished me good luck. Free of charge. That saved me a lot of troubles. Thank you

resp.text:
Kyle,
Thank you so much for taking your time to write this sweet experience.  We are so glad we could help you with something that seemed so simple.  If you ever need anything at all, don't hesitate to call.  Congratulations!
Dawn

name: April DePaola
text: The ONLY jeweler to use!!!  I stopped in today expecting to have to leave my jewelry for repair but they took care of it on the spot. Great selection of jewelry and the employees are the most helpful without being pushy for a sale. It’s worth your while to stop in and look periodically just to see the new items they’ve received in the estate area too. :-).

resp.text:
You are so sweet April! I enjoyed seeing you and that precious baby boy! It's always a pleasure helping you! Thanks for your kind words! :)
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Jessica OBanner
text:
I've been coming to Gulf Shores for years.  This past trip was memorable like all the rest. However, I wanted to add some Pandora Charms to my bracelet to commemorate this visit. I googled to see if there were any jewelry stores in the area that carried the brand. Diamond Jewelers have an entire section of Pandora Merchandise. I was warmly greeted as soon as I entered the store. **There wasn't that awkward silence like someone is estimating how much you're going to spend.**  The saleswoman was informative, patient, and attentive. Great customer service will always leave a lasting impression. I'll definitely be returning.
J. from Jackson, MS

name: Kew Taybi
text: This was my first purchase at this jewelry store. They came highly recommended by a friend and I was not disappointed. The sales lady who met me was most helpful and give me several options at very reasonable prices.

name: Linda Richmond
text: I just made my first purchase from Diamond Jewelers this past week. They were very professional, friendly and helpful. They have a great selection of jewelry and all at great prices. I will definitely be returning to make future purchases.

name: Tom Martin
text: Having recently moved to Gulf Shore, this was our first visit to Diamond Jewelers.  We could not have been more impressed with the extensive knowledge and friendliness of the entire sales staff.  Stephanie was exceptional patiently guiding us through their large estate jewelry inventory.   Diamond Jewelers is now our “go to” jewelry store for all our fine jewelry purchases.

resp.text:
Tom,
Thank you so much for your sweet review.  We are so happy to have you in our area and are glad you feel at home with the store! I'm always here to help if you need anything at all!
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Barbette Driver
text: I stopped in Diamond Jewelers to get a battery replaced in a waterproof watch and the staff welcomed me as if I did business in there often and was a regular customer.  The jeweler also fixed a necklace.  The charge was very reasonable .  I highly recommended them for your jewelry needs.

name: Wendy Ingram
text: Jewelry repair top notch! Exceptional customer service with Lorrie as well. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Wendy! Hope you have a great rest of your summer 🌴🌞🍉

name: Pam Harris
text: Delightful Experience! The staff was very professional, knowledgeable, and personable. I loved working with Dawn  -- She provided personized service...going the extra mile to ensure that I was completely satisfied with my purchase.  What I valued most was her genuine excitement and happiness for me - she made it fun!!!!!  Looking forward to my next shopping experience at Diamond Jewelers!

name: Phyllis Britt
text: I initially went to Diamond Jewelers two years ago to buy the Gulf Shores Pandora charm for our daughters, daughter in laws and granddaughter.  Since then I have bought many Pandora charms for birthdays and Christmas.  Last Fall I broke a favorite paisley necklace, took it by to see if they could repair.  They did !!  Yesterday they helped me get new battery for my husband's watch.  I cannot say enough how nice everyone is. So glad I found them and would recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: thank you Phyllis for the sweet generous feedback. Thank you for letting us serve you!

name: Jan Marsh
text: I asked that DJ  find a specific stone for a ring and a setting to accommodate a specific carat weight of diamonds around the stone — all within a budget amount. They quickly got in two stones and two settings to meet these requirements for me to see. I selected the stone and setting and the finished ring (which they shipped to me) far exceeded my expectations. I love my sales person -Dawn. She worked tirelessly with many calls, texts pictures etc to make this happen.

name: Phil Payne
text:
It is always a great experience shopping at Diamond Jewelers. Jeff the owner always greets everyone with a smile as well as all the wonderful ladies that work there
Great selection of all kinds of diamonds and ladies jewelry
Always a pleasure to shop there

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words Phil! Thank you and Lisa for choosing us, we are blessed to have you as faithful customers ❤️

name: dennis holland
text: great experiance

resp.text: Thank you Dennis!

name: Mark Scarborough
text: The entire staff at Diamond Jewelers are always friendly and very helpful when I visit. Best jewelers in the area!

resp.text: Thank you Mark! We appreciate the positive feedback

name: Clara Hendrix
text: Everyone is so nice and helpful at the store. Stephanie has always helped me find the perfect gift. She has always made me feel special.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Clara! It's always so good to see you! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Gerald Sanders
text:
Wonderful people. Excellent customer service. Always  a pleasure to do business with  Diamond Jewelers.

.

name: Penny Groux
text: Shopping at Diamond Jewelers is always a wonderful experience.  The care and personal attention given to customers is unparalleled and their knowledge and advice is always sincerely appreciated.  I’m so thankful I found such a great jeweler here on the beautiful Alabama Gulf Coast!

resp.text: You are the sweetest Penny! Thank you for the sweet message. Hope you guys have a blessed Christmas 🎄

name: Robert Lancaster
text: Very friendly,  helpful,  knowledgeable and accommodating.  Oh, and reasonable prices. What more could you ask for? My new hometown jeweler!

name: Steve Peralta
text:
Great place to shop for jewelry.
Lorrie Kruk helped me again find the right gift for my wife. She is always so sweet and helpful. Everyone there is also very nice.
I like shopping local so I keep them on my list of places I go for quality merchandise and impeccable service.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Steve, for your kind words!  It's always a pleasure seeing your smiling face!  I hope your wife loves her gift.  I look forward to your next visit!  ...... Lorrie

name: Phyllis Britt
text: This is my favorite jewelry store.  They are my go to store for Pandora charms for gifts and they have really cool Gulf Shores and Orange Beach Pandora charms.   Also saw new Orange Beach and Gulf Shores bracelets that use the letters to close bracelet.  It’s in my birthday and Santa lists. ❤️

name: Stephanie Gatlin
text: Diamond Jewelers is truly the best jewelry store in the heart of Gulf Shores.  I have been apart of the Diamond Jewelers family for 5 years, and I couldn't think of a better place to spend my days.  When customers walk through the door, we want them to feel right at home.  Diamond Jewelers is not only a business, but also a happy place where customers leave as friends.  We strive to go above and beyond for every jewelry need. We genuinely appreciate every person that comes in, and strive to give them a wonderful experience.

name: Janet Ayers
text:
Called in advance to make sure they had what we were looking for and walked in and they had just what we asked for. Gulf Shores inspired beads for my Pandora Braclet. They had so many great beads but they had several with Gulf Shores initialed on them. We made our choice and had an easy transaction.

Thanks Diamond Jewelers for helping us. I will be back. I own a Vacation Rental - Sand Dollar #9 -Right Foot Riveria - Gulf Shores and will be referring my guest your way for that perfect souvenir.

resp.text: Janet, thank you for the sweet message. So glad we could help you with your jewelry needs and we appreciate the referrals 💕

name: Kelli McKee
text: Always a pleasure!  Watch repair on multiple watches and removed links while I waited.  Plus it smells wonderful.  They have a candle for sale that is to die for!  Amazing staff.

name: sumatra drayton
text:
Stephanie was super nice and very helpful.
They have a great selection of Pandora charms. I just love my Gulf Shores charm!

resp.text: You're so sweet Sumatra! It was a pleasure helping you! I hope you enjoy your charm! We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Take Care! Stephanie

name: Linda Hallmark
text: Always shop here during our trips to the Shrimp Festival. Great selection of Pandora charms and jewelry. Staff is very friendly and helpful which makes shopping enjoyable. Jewelry is reasonably priced.

name: Kyle H
text: Perfect store.. visited to look around with my wife. Went back in to buy a pair of ear rings, was given a cute gift bag. Looks great, she will be very very happy.

name: Lisa Fourroux
text: I've had great experiences with jewelry repair. I purchase my Pandora gifts at Diamond Jewelers, as their customer service and variety of Pandora make my shopping experience worthwhile. The staff is professional and attentive.

name: Lisa Gentry
text: This is the best place to get Pandora! The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly.....my go to at Gulf Shores!

text: I came in looking for a Pandora bracelet for my mother.   Lorrie Kruk was amazing!  She took time to show me all of the different charms and clips, helping me put together the PERFECT bracelet for my mom!  I am so excited and can’t wait to give it to her.  Thank you Lorrie and Diamond Jewelers!

name: Ed Rawle
text: Staff was polite, very helpful and friendly! Five star service!

name: Sue Foskett
text: They gave me a fair price to fix my rings.  Thank goodness I came in that day or I would have lost my main diamond.  I had not had my prongs checked in some time and won't make that mistake again.

name: Eric Saxe

Stephanie

name: Ross B.

text: Immediately upon entering the store, I was greeted with a smile and a warm hello by a sweet, young lady named Stephanie.  It was my first visit to the store, as I am a snowbird from Illinois. There's a pretty pair if Vahan earrings that I will probably end up purchasing prior to heading North.  Stephanie was a delight and I will probably return to the store just to tell her hi!

resp.text: You are the sweetest Mrs. Carol! It was such a pleasure meeting you and showing you around the store.  I know you're going to enjoy your bracelet! I look forward to seeing you again soon!! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Dayna Brannan
text:
I visited the store today and was overwhelmed by the customer service I received by Stephanie. She helped me pick out a bracelet for mine and my wife’s first grand baby. . I will recommend your store and Stephanie to my friends and family. #eternallygrateful..

Thank you,

David Brannan

David,
Thank you so much for coming in and allowing me to be a part of this exciting time! It was a joy to help with a bracelet to represent baby Lilly! I look forward to seeing you and Mrs. Dayna soon! Congratulations on the new Grandbaby!
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Kim Hall
text: I've been dealing Dawn and Diamond Jewelers for years and I've had excellent service and been treated like family.

Dawn

name: Sheree' Parker
text: Great customer service,  definitely plan on going back for future purchases.

resp.text:
Thank you Sheree! Thankful for your business.
Blessings 💝

name: Raven Rogers
text: I wish I would've gotten the name of the wonderful lady who took care of us while we were there! She was awesome!!! If you're looking for a Pandora charm, this is the place 😁

name: Ann Suggs

It was a pleasure to do business there. I look forward to shopping with them again!

name: L Pennell
text: Very professional and friendly sales staff. Large Pandora selection. Highly recommend stopping here during your beach stay.

name: Mary Licavoli
text: The ladies at Diamond Jewelers were wonderful!  They were energetic,  friendly, and so helpful. I was having fun trying on the items of Julie Vos, and I love the Julie Vos bracelet I purchased!!.  These ladies were so helpful in giving us places to eat, as we wanted to avoid the "tourist trap" dining spots.  We loved everything about Gulf Shores, Diamond, beach, weather,  and most of all,  the people are so, so nice!

resp.text: Mary, hope you and your husband found some great places to eat! We love the Julie Vos and it’s easy to get excited over. Hope y’all are having a great time. Come back and we’ll play with some more JV 💕

name: Cierra Dison
text: Beautiful selection, beautiful people, and a beautiful store! Very patient and helpful as well.

name: Linda Duke
text: I had a small gold chain to be repaired, and a couple of questions about customizing a bracelet. Everyone was so friendly & helpful & knowledgeable. I was treated as if I were spending a million dollars. I will be back and will also recommend Diamond Jewelers to anyone needing a reputable jeweler.

resp.text: Mrs. Linda, This just made our day! You are one precious lady! I thoroughly enjoyed helping you, and I'm so happy you enjoyed your visit with us! I look forward to seeing you again soon! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Doug cudaofflorida
text: Great service. Love Stephanie - friendly, personable and professional. Will definitely do business with Stephanie at DJ again.

name: Joieya Warren
text: Wonderful customer service .Stephanie and Daphne were  awesome.

name: Brad Shults
text:
Very professional, courteous, and friendly staff.
I highly reccomend Diamond Jewelers.
Great prices and beautiful jewelry.
I never felt pressured to buy.

name: Kim Barrett
text: Diamond Jewelers is amazing place! They were so helpful helping me pick out my first pandora bracelet and helping me make a choice of my first charm! I will be back to shop at this place, Thank y’all again for helping me!

name: Shelby Sullivan
text: Top notch service every time! Lori is extremely responsive and has great taste, I know my mom will enjoy her mother of the bride gift as much as I do!

text: Stopped in for Pandora Orange Beach charms.  Ladies were very friendly and very helpful!  Had a great time chatting with them!

Madeline was so kind and helpful when I was searching through all the beautiful Pandora charms.
She made shopping so very easy!

name: Amy Southers
text: Wonderful customer service! Jewelry selection is amazing! I would recommend them any time!

name: Wendy Hamme
text: My husband and I walked in and the young lady was right there to help us  I was looking to upgrade my wedding ring settings and she was so helpful to me. I picked out what I wanted and I will get it back in a few days. You dont have to wait weeks like most places. I'll be back to upgrade my diamond stud earrings next

resp.text: I'm so glad we found something you love! I enjoyed helping y'all! You made it too easy! I can't wait for you to see your new wedding set! I look forward to helping you in the future!! Thanks so much! Stephanie

name: Tina Bellau
text: First time stopping in for a Pandora purchase and had a very good experience! The staff was courteous and helpful. I’ll definitely be back in to check out other inventory in the future!

name: Nancy Carter
text: I always use Diamond Jewelers for all  my jewelry needs.  They are outstanding

name: nautiquecowboy nautiquecowboy
text: I live in South Carolina was visiting gulf shores when my wife told me about  this jewelry store undoubtedly the best experience  ever had   purchasing jewelry highly recommend them especially  Stephanie she was GREAT!!  Yes made my 2nd purchase through these people Laurie this time same great service

text: My daughter's Pandora bracelet was lost a few months ago. We're so happy we had the charm you needed!!! It's on it's way for you today! Thank you so much!! We're glad your daughter is happy!

name: Cassi Wolski
text: I cannot say enough things about this jeweler! They have a beautiful high quality selection. We worked with Stephanie and she was so sweet patient and professional.  We purchased a new setting for my engagement ring solitaire while we were vacationing there and my solitaire fell out(after 10 years). They helped me select the perfect ring. We put it in layaway as our 10th anniversary was in December(this happened in June). I forgot to snap a picture of it while we were there so I called Stephanie and she happily got it out of the safe and put it on her own finger and sent me pictures via text message. She went above and beyond! We were shopping with our kids and they offered them chocolates and water. We called to have my diamond placed in the new ring on Wednesday of this week and they placed it on the same day we called and overnighted the ring to me for free. I live 6 hours from Gulf Shores. It was at my door the next morning. It is so beautiful! I am so thankful we went there to see about getting my original ring repaired and ended up with a gorgeous new ring that has special meaning since it was purchased at one of my favorite vacation spots. If you need a jeweler you can trust and who has a gorgeous selection give them a try. 👍🏼👍🏼

name: Graham Berry
text: I have been in this store multiple times and received excellent service in the past but due to the service that I recently received I will not be returning. When I arrived to get a quote from the jeweler the woman behind the counter was exceptionally rude and condescending. While speaking with the jeweler the woman continued to make rude and unnecessary comments and even told the jeweler to have me take the products elsewhere. I left the store feeling inadequate and even embarrassed. Based solely on this experience, I will not be returning and would not recommend this business.

resp.text:
Graham,

I just read your review, and I wanted to apologize from the bottom of my heart for your experience yesterday.  I’m sorry I didn’t realize that you had been in.  I know the situation was not handled in the best manner, but I will say the store was short three employees yesterday making for a very hectic day.  I feel certain the associate was feeling overwhelmed and it was not intentional by any means.   I know you and I had a great rapport, and I hope that you will let us make it right in the future.

name: Ethan Cobbs
text: Klos Diamond Center is amazing! I heard about Read Klos through family and man was he a life saver. I was looking for a specific style for my fiance's ring and a budget of 3k. Over the course of a couple weeks he found exactly what I wanted and not a penny over budget. He's super nice and informative too! Made me feel right at home and even took the time to educate me on the basics of diamonds. Which was very nice and helpful. Overall, he did a fantastic job and we will definitely be using him again in the future!

resp.text: Hey Ethan, congratulations sir!  Thank you so much for your business, it was such a pleasure to have helped you with such an important occasion like getting engaged!  Thank you again for the kind words Ethan, looking forward to many more in the coming years sir!

resp.text: WOW, thank you so much Mr. Lewis, it was such a pleasure to have helped you with such an important occasion and lifetime memory.  Thank you so much sir!

name: K Vandy
text: I was referred to Read Klos at Klos Diamond Center by a friend from work. I was looking for an engagement ring, had been to a couple local businesses, but wasn’t confident I was getting the perfect ring at a fair price. I brought my fiancé with me on the first visit just as a “looking around town” type of visit. When we met Read he was genuinely excited that we had been referred to him and took a lot of time to explain the types of bands and diamonds available. We left with a few solid ideas on the band (this was big progress!). I came back to see Read by myself and selected the band. He then helped me shop for the right diamond, something I was still unsure about. Read has access to diamonds from all over the country of varying qualities, sizes, and cuts. He gave me some parameters of the size and cut he thought would look good in the band. Once I selected a few options we discussed price. All I asked for was a fair price and I truly believe I got it. The other thing that was important to us was for there to be service after the sale. Read Kloss has a great reputation and the times I was in his store return customers would stop by to browse, drop items for repair, or just to say hi. There was a relationship. Bottom line-my wife loved her ring. She bought me a watch from Klos Diamond Center as a wedding gift. I have been back several times for anniversary and birthday gifts. Read offers a wide price range of jewelry and watches to fit about any budget, but the key is you’ll get first class service at a fair price, regardless.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your business Kevin. It is such a pleasure to have clients like you that take the time to leave feedback so others can look and see why people shop at Klos Diamond Center. Thank you again for your kind words sir. Your personal Gemologist Jeweler, Read

name: Josh Ridenour
text:
Amazing overall experience with Read Klos at Klos Diamond Center!

I don't usually write reviews for things, unless they're really bad experiences with places or items, but not this time.  I'm a newly engaged man in my 30's and having never purchased any jewelry before.  Naturally I reach out to my family and my Step-Dad was quick to say "Go see Read. He'll take care of you."  Read has been my Step-Dad's jeweler for years so I knew who he was but had never dealt with him first hand.  He definitely took care of me to say the least!  From the moment I walked in Read and his staff were extremely helpful, had a great selection to look at, listened to what I was looking for and what my budget was, were extremely patient, and helped me find "the ring" that has had people asking my fiancée where I got that beautiful ring from!

Now keep in mind that I had actually picked out two different rings and due to certain circumstances had to change my mind twice before finding "the ring"!  The response from Read was always the same, "hey that's fine, not a problem, now let's find the one!"

After that Read, knowing what I was looking for, based on our conversations, found exactly what I was looking for in a ring and then found a great deal on a beautiful diamond in the parameters I wanted and in my budget!  And did I mention he did it quickly!!!  His communication with me the entire time was quick and easy and constant between the phone calls, texts, and emails.

The customer service didn't stop after the purchase though.  He set up a wonderful, private, jewelry soirée for my Fiancée and her friends which they thoroughly enjoyed!!  Next, when she went to go get the ring sized, her Facebook post read "When you walk in to have your ring sized and your jeweler greets you by name and offers you wine. He gets me."  The fact that he takes care of my Lady when I'm not there, speaks volumes and is greatly appreciated!!!

If you're looking for a jeweler to be YOUR JEWELER, that will learn what your style is and more importantly your Lady's style, take care of you both every step of the way, with great service... I just have a simple phrase.... Go see Read. He'll take care of you.

Ended up paying way more than the watch is worth. They kept the tag because it was a gift so they wouldn't do anything about it. They apologized and said they would try to fix errors in the system, hope they do. Just make sure to ask for the tag and double check everything before leaving.

text: I took my wives rings in to have them soldered together, they told me the stones were loose from her wearing them and would have to be tightened. I then gave them a ring (part of the set) that had not been worn since they resized it. It also had loose stones. They were going to charge me 300 dollars to have the work done. I left the rings with them and they told me it would be a week. A week goes by, I go back to check progress and they hadn't been touched yet. I took the rings to Croniers and they only charged me 40 dollars to have the same work done and had it done in 2 days. I will never return  to this store. (Edit to owners response) as I stated above your store did have my rings. From the 6th of December until the 14th when my wife picked them back up to take them elsewhere since they had yet to be touched. Luckily she did this or we would have been overcharged by $260. You should be ashamed for trying to price gouge someone like that.

resp.text: Yes sir. Thank you for your review. I have confirmed that we inspected your rings a couple days ago and recommended that all 3 rings needed stones tightened and refinishing work performed , prior to soldering them together. We quoted 300 for soldering, polishing & rhodium, plus all the above work. You declined, which, of course is your prerogative .You did not leave anything with us and obviously choose to go a different route. Thank you again for your consideration.

They have treated me like family and in the process not only gained my business but also my friendship. Jan, Courtney, Susan and Benji are some of the finest people that I've ever met. I will never again go to anyone else with my fine jewelry purchases. I strongly recommend and encourage everyone to give your business to this fine store. I definitely recommend them proudly to anyone and everyone looking for fine quality jewelry and Diamonds.

resp.text: Awesome!

name: Cynthia Hamby
text: My husband and I had the MOST AMAZING experience at this store. Aside from how friendly the staff was everyone in the store made us feel like we were their priority! We had a custom ring made and they truly made my dreams come true! I couldn’t be happier! If they don’t have it they can make it! I tried on so many rings and then Lyle came over and in a matter of minutes I knew he understood what I was looking for and bam next thing I knew we were going custom! Now I have a ring no one else in the world will have.

resp.text: Thrilled that you love it! Our pleasure. Thanks.

name: Kevin Kiser
text:
Best customer service in town.

100% chance I will be back

resp.text: Thank you Kevin!

name: Macie Sommers
text: I love Marquirettes! My boyfriend and I went in after shopping around for an engagement ring and found the most beautiful ring there! Courtney helped us and was very knowledgeable and had GREAT taste! She knew exactly what I was looking for and helped us make our budget too! I couldn’t have asked for better service, ring, and price! Thank you!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Katherine Chastain
text: So helpful and patient for my fiancé and me during our front selection!

name: Ben Berrey
text: Marquirette’s was a great shopping experience. They helped me find the perfect engagement ring and designed a tennis bracelet that gets my wife compliments all of the time. I can’t imagine going to a chain or some other local shop that doesn’t have the ties to the community and buying power of Marquirette’s. This is the only jewelry store I’ll ever shop at again.

name: Mariel Shumate
text: I simply cannot say enough good things about these Jewelers! My fiance wanted a very unique wedding band, and they were able to create a custom band that was everything that he wanted.  It took a couple of visits to come up with the design and they were always extremely welcoming and helpful.  I would recommend this store to everyone!

name: t fulton
text: i absolutely love this store! You can feel the passion and the integrity that the owners have for the store. everything is completely beautiful. the inventory they have is breathtaking. every piece of jewelry is made with the utmost quality. you never have to worry about getting a bad deal. and there is so much more than jewelry, there's fine china, everyday china, perfumes, jewelry boxes, and gift items. Marquirettes is always my place to go for a gift for any occasion. they fit your price range, and if they don't have it they give you many other choices for a custom masterpiece.

resp.text: Thanks a lot! We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again!

name: Cyndi Crews
text: Mary Ann was wonderful to work with and helped me find my dream ring.  I will be back.

name: james kent
text: Marquirette’s jewelry, prices, and service are excellent. This is the only place I shop. Mainly because of the owner and the people who work their. They are fair on prices and will work with you to find the best jewelry within the price you want to meet. I will be back

resp.text: Thanks! We appreciate the review and hope to see you soon!

name: Gloria
text: I took two wrist watches to be serviced, and it was quick and affordable. Marquirette and Mary Ann were warm and kind. P.S If you are looking for some fine china for your wedding registry, they have quite a beautiful collection.

name: Jenny Allen
text: Great customer service! Real helpful and nice people! My husband needed his wedding removed. Marquirette and her staff were very accommodating and professional in performing this service. Thanks to Miss "J" for her diligence,patience and hands on experience we were able to remove his ring with my minimal stress!

name: Patrick Franks
text: Outstanding service and friendly low pressure atmosphere. Knocked the gift out of the park and extremely helpful suggestions.

resp.text: Happy to hear it, Patrick! See you soon.

name: Rebecca Buck
text: I love Marquirette’s!! Beautiful jewelry and great customer service. Sarah is very knowledgeable and made our buying experience perfect!

resp.text: Hi Rebecca Buck, we really appreciate your feedback and such kind words! We're looking forward to serving you again.

name: stephanie robbins
text:
Horrible Customer Service. My husband bought me earrings for Christmas. He purchased them 1 week ago. I tried to return them today only to be told I could not return them during their year end sale. I drove 45 minutes just to return these. Why does it matter that your store is having a sale that I can't return my item and yes I had the receipt. I also can't return them for my money back only store credit. That seems real shady. If you have confidence in your product you would refund a customers money. I'm thinking maybe I need to have these earrings appraised and see if they are even real. I'm
NEVER going back! Also if you look at their Facebook page there is not an
Option to review the business, probably because they know they have a shady business practice. I saw a negative comment about their "sale" and a few days later it was gone. I guess they deleted it. PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE read the reviews. STAY AWAY FROM THIS BUSINESS!!!!

name: Carol Roberts
text: I have mixed feelings about this store. I've shopped here several times and purchased some things at Christmas one year (crystal) without incident. I believe they provided me with an appraisal for my engagement ring as well for insurance purposes. For a long time they were a very popular store, and then they had some public relations problems within the local community. They are not my first choice for jewelry work.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and for being a repeat customer. We are always trying to provide the most professional & affordable fine jewelry repair . Please visit or new location at Peppertree and allow us to give you a tour of our expanded jewelry shop, master jewelers and samples of client jobs.

name: Terry L Shaeiwitz
text: Fabulous job done on resetting stone in a new setting.  Thank you~

name: Lauren Breeding
text: I brought my mothers original engagement ring into Marquirette's to create something special for myself and was given multiple beautiful options to choose from. I ultimately went with a right hand ring. Marquirette, Lyle, and MaryAnn were incredibly helpful and provided personable service, as well as reasonable pricing, not to mention quick turn around with same day pick up for my special ring. I highly recommend Marquirette's for any jewelry needs. It’s not my first wonderful experience with them, and it will definitely not be my last.

resp.text: Lauren-Thank You, It's our pleasure.

name: Ali Harper
text: Courtney Brodgen is an amazing knowledgeable worker. She’s been helping me & my family shop jewelry for years and I wouldn’t trust anyone else when shopping diamonds!

text: When my mother passed she left me some random gold pieces - old charms and broken bracelets. I didn't know what to do with them. Courtney Brodgen helped my sell it to the store and she was friendly, kind and compassionate in the process.

text: Had a situation, but have to say Lyle personally handled it to my satisfaction. He went way beyond what I expected. I am so pleased! Showed lots of class!

After searching for a wedding ring for quite some time, I really couldn’t find the exact match for my preference. Even went to several different Jewelry stores and the service was horrible!
However, My experiences at Mariquettes was professional, enjoyable, and SOOOOOOO worth my time to find the perfect wedding ring for myself and even my soon-to-be husband! Sarah and Benji were amazing and my ring is absolutely more than what I could ask for! These people have made my specia day that more special! Thank you so much! 🙏🏼😊
Tori Weber

text: Very friendly, professional, knowledgeable and quick to help. Marquirette personally greeted me and showed me her beautiful designs and was genuinely kind and hospitable. I have several pieces of beautiful jewelry. ❤❤❤

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We are so glad you enjoyed your experience.

name: Andrea Diggs
text: She threw me out of the store and asked that I never come back...so here is the story.. I received a gift card and coupon. Lyle had told me I could use them together on my purchase.. I found a sweet Reed and Barton jewelry box for my daughter for Christmas.. I had left the coupons and gift certificate at home so I put the box on hold..Anne.. A family member helped the sales clerk.. This was 6pm on Tuesday.. Wednesday I go back..coupons in hand..and they tell me my box has been sold earlier that day.the old lady said it was my fault I did not put any money down...well no one asked..I would have been happy to put a hold payment on it..then the old lady and I proceed to vocalize our opinions.. Thought the customer was always right..it was the only box so another could be ordered, but at full price, and not in time for Christmas.. Then she threw me out...Word to all who have gift cards or coupons from this joint..they don't honor them..FYI.. I am a long time Montgomery residence... Have purchased there before..dont know what has happened ..so sad but I won't go back, even if I could.

name: Anthony Frederiksen
text: Assistance with purchase of earrings and assisted with photos of jewelry for me to sell online. Excellent service!!

name: Chase Taylor
text: I’ve bought my wife several things. She loves the presents, and they make it easy to shop.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words. Hope to see you again soon!

text: Bought my wife's engagement ring here. At first the were very helpful but once the sale was made could be more opposite. Took it back for the free resizing said it would be 1 day ended up taking 2. When my wife walk out of the store she noticed that the diamond was not her diamond that she had been wearing for weeks. she went back in side and they tried to brush it off as a mark on the stone. "who would by a stone with a big spot right in the middle?" I went up their and continued to get the cold shoulder.  Tried to pressure at no avail. Since this I have heard of many of the same doings. DO NOT TRUST THEM!

text: Benjamin is the best !!! Very professional but personable. & the jewelry is exceptional!!

name: Lennon Learning
text: Just called here and recieved the WORST customer service. I asked a simple question and was given the such a bad attitude. When I asked to speak to the manager they pretty much said no. I have spent money here before, but I will not buy anything from a store that does not value good customer service. I will be sure to shop at a GOOD jewelry store. Thank goodness for Ware Jewlers.

name: Drew Parsley
text: DO NOT SHOP HERE! My wife and I both ordered our wedding bands from Marquirettes during one of their crazy sales and were really happy about the price. It was certainly too good to be true because while my ring came in after a few weeks as advertised, my wife's band took much longer than they said it would. We timed it out where I would be able to pick up her ring before I left school after graduation and that time passed. We figured it would only be a bit behind schedule, but after 4-5 months of waiting (on a 6-8 week purchase) we had to buy a new band from somewhere else. We didn't receive a single call or email from them regarding the delayed shipment and we had to call every couple of weeks to hear that it was on its way. They had apparently ordered it from overseas and instead of getting us a new ring when ours didn't show up they just sat around and waited for it. it got to be a month before our wedding and we knew we couldn't wait any longer so we had to call them up and demand a refund (because they didn't offer us one even after all that time). This was by far the worst customer service I have ever dealt with and will not ever recommend this company to anyone. PLEASE learn from my mistake and don't ever purchase something from here unless you are 100% sure you can leave the store with it on the spot.

name: Jennifer P
text: I'd wanted to have my bridal set redesigned for years, but I was really unsure how to go about it.  My husband has bought several pieces of jewelry for me at Marquirette's over the past few years.  I've gotten to feel comfortable with them. Since our 10th anniversary was approaching, I asked Benjy to help with the redesign.  He asked me to give him an idea of the style I like. I printed out a few images online and we looked through the cases for similar styles. The diamonds from my original bridal set were princess cut, and I wanted them to be the focal point in the new ring. I found a setting in the store that I really liked, but it didn't accommodate my diamonds. Benjy went to work measuring and configuring a new setting based on all these different components. A few days later he showed me a digital image of the proposed new ring. We talked about it, tweaked a few items, took more measurements, and he had an updated image of the design a few days later.  I was very happy with what he'd come up with, so we moved forward with having the mounting casted. A couple weeks later they took my diamonds to be placed in the new setting. My husband and I picked up the new ring this past week. I'm blown away!  It's breathtaking!  Far better than I imagined. We cannot thank Benjy, Abby, Lyle and all the sweet ladies who work at Marquirette's enough. I would never have taken the leap without their guidance and expertise. They have a customer for life in me!

resp.text: Love your review! Thanks.

name: abby pope
text: Great customer service!! Love love Benjy!! Beautiful store and wonderful selection!! I will be back again!!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We are so glad you enjoyed your experience.

name: Noelle Carter
text: I went in to buy a watch as a Christmas gift for my sister! Had a great experience, would definitely recommend 10/10!!!  Great staff and owners!

name: Destiny Sadler
text: Great customer service and very knowledgeable about stones and metals! My husband purchased my engagement and wedding from here! They really pay attention to the small details!
