resp.text: Our pleasure. I's been great to see to be of service to you and Bruce. Thrilled to see your family grow. Thanks for the compliments!

name: Ethan Kelly
text: Good.

name: Jeanne Uuro
text: Great store and super great people <3

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We really appreciate it!

name: Marshall Thrasher
text: They did exactly what i needed and got the job done for the engagement ring i was purchasing. Everyone was nice and friendly and will be going back again.

name: Trista Houser
text: Great customer service!

name: DeDe Richardson
text: I would be absolutely horrified if I had a business and had this many complaints about the owners and the staff. You better change a lot of things or you will be out of business.

name: Quenton Jackson
text: Great place great people!

name: Elliot K
text:
My fiance and I had a horrible experience dealing with the very unprofessional staff at Marquirette's and would not recommend them to anyone.  We had an engagement ring custom-made and it took us almost SIX months to finally get the ring back.  We never got exactly what had been promised, but finally got close enough and gave up.   During the stressful course of events, many things happened that were unprofessional and just poor business. Some of the lowlights include:

-the staff repeatedly forgot that we were using our own gems (the whole reason we had a ring custom made)

-staff seemingly just forgot about us multiple times.  they were supposed to send a design and a week, two weeks, three weeks would go by and then i would call to check and they would make up an excuse about their e-mail system crashing or their daughter had accidentally deleted their e-mails.

-Had the ring made a completely wrong size (even after telling them repeatedly in person and through e-mail the correct size)

-After ring had been made the completely wrong size, we were told they would fix it as soon as possible.  I received a phone call two days later saying that everything was taken care of and the ring had been resized.  We came into town the following day to pick up the ring and it had not been touched.  It was still the same wrong size it had originally been made.  Then the jeweler who would have to resize was out of town on vacation for a week.

-When it finally was resized, the bands did not fit snugly against the engagement ring like they had before, and the staff was condescending to my finance and tried to make her think it had always fit that way.

-The staff lost our extra diamonds and gold from the ring then tried to act like we had traded those in, even though that had never been discussed.

The store looks fancy and the staff looks professional, but it is all a facade.  If you just need to walk in and buy a ring, they could probably get that right, but I would NOT trust them with any custom work and will not be using them again for any of our jewelry needs.

name: Mitty Parker
text: I had very bad experience all of the staff was stuck up besides one of them i bought a bracelet they sized it wrong i took it back to them and they wasn't even trying to meet me half way in the middle all of their is to expensive but not worth a dime oh btw the manager don't even knowledge his customers so i will never go back again

name: Michael Hudgins
text: Great customer service!

name: Christopher Hamil
text: Their music outside is pretty loud and annoying.

resp.text: Thank you for  pointing this out to us. We have lowered the volume.

name: Elizabeth Wymer
text: Not trustworthy

name: Amy Harrison
text: After shopping around completely stressed, my fiancé came in and you guys took all of the stress off of him. He wanted a customized engagement ring and you guys made him feel at ease. The ring turned out completely amazing. He says he will never go anywhere else for jewelry.

resp.text: Congratulations! We will always be here for you. Thanks.

name: Kennedy Daniel
text: My Fiancé and I were on a search for a wedding band and we were getting discouraged because everywhere we looked nothing would match well with my engagement ring or it was way out of budget. We walked into Mannings and Mary greeted us and she knew exactly what we needed. We customized a band that would fit perfectly to my ring and it was even cheaper than our budget. Glynn made our ring and  both were very responsive and helpful if we had any questions. I love how my ring turned out!! It took only 2 weeks to get in which made this place even better!

resp.text: We just loved the opportunity to work with you! So glad that you love your rings! Come see us soon! ~Mary

name: Nick Neysari
text: I needed my wedding band re-sized, many people recommended Manning jewelers. I picked up my ring today and I was pleasantly surprised that my ring of 40 years looked better today than when it was just purchased. Thank you for doing such magnificent work. You have earned my business and respect! I will be your customer for good.

resp.text: Yay! We love to hear that you are happy with your experience with Manning Jewelry!

name: Brenda Hancock
text:
I am a lifelong resident of the S Baldwin area.
Any time my family and I have needed jewelry repaired or serviced we have always trusted Manning’s. Just today I picked up a ring I had sized there. The workmanship and attention to detail is perfect. I could not be happier with the results.
Manning’s is a favorite of mine and I highly recommend this longtime Foley family owned business.
In sixty years we’ve never been disappointed with their professionalism, friendliness and the overall quality of their work.
If you are a newcomer to this area please visit them.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you! We have been thrilled by how many new-to-the-area people have been visiting based on reviews and personal referrals. We love our community!

name: Brittany Till
text: I love wearing both yellow and white gold together. I’ve searched for a monogram necklace that used both. I found a plated piece I liked, but didn’t love-also wanted it to be in actual gold. I took the piece and worked with Brandi and Mr. Manning to create a custom monogram pendant. I wanted to create a pendant so I could change the chain to change the look. They nailed it! Highly recommend Manning Jewelry!

resp.text: I love working with you and am so happy you are pleased with your necklace! ~Brandi

name: Suzy Ikerd
text:
The people in this store are
wonderful. They are extremely helpful and are very kind and nice. And if the one waiting on you does not know the answer to your question,  they will find out the answer for you. My husband and I have been going to Manning's for a very long time and have never dissatisfied.

resp.text: Thank you Suzy! We love what we do!

name: Cathy Reynertson
text: Their customer service is amazing from the moment you walk through the door.  They acknowledge you, welcome you and are attentive to why you've come to their location. Their knowledge and quality of work was evident in every step of the process.  I had my wedding ring reset and am thrilled with the results. It was restored to the beauty it had 34 years ago.  Thank you Glenn.  I highly recommend Manning for any precious jewelry needs you may have.

resp.text: Thank you Cathy! So happy you are thrilled with your ring!

name: ben sherrill
text: just talked to mary i was looking for a silver chain with a marlin or sailfish on it and they didnt have any but she took my number down and said she will find some send me pictures and order it if i like it that is awesome customer service right there cant wait

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ben! We will work hard to find you the right chain and pendant! We love our fisherman. ~Mary

name: Thompson Stine
text: Literally perfect! This was probably the best customer experience I have ever had! I came in looking for an engagement ring that I needed that same night so I was fairly unprepared, very late and kind of frantic. Mary took the time to really explain the 4 C's so that I actually understood them, she also calmed me down and helped get me the perfect ring. She even gave me some great proposal and relationship advice that I have already followed. Duke was awesome too! He had the head/prongs changed on the band and the diamond set in less than an hour. I had to make up a story to tell my now FIANCÉE about where my brother in law and I were all day and told her we tried to go fishing but couldn't and we went and hung out at a bar named Duke's all day. They even offered to help me not blow my cover! I was kind of expecting to walk out empty handed due to the timing but I left with a ring better than I could have imagined and I was over the moon. I honestly don't think I could be any happier with Manning Jewelry, especially Mary and Duke! THANK YOU!!!

resp.text: The pleasure was all ours! Duke and I loved helping you find the perfect ring. Our goal is to educate you so you can make a well informed decision. We loved giving you a true Manning Experience. Please come by every time you return to the beach. Congratulations! `Mary and Duke

name: Sandra Roberts
text: Just want to give kudos to Becky, Mary and Duke at Manning Jewelry. Several months ago, I took in my sterling silver jewelry to be cleaned and repaired. They did a fabulous job. They cleaned my gold wedding rings and checked the prongs, on the spot, and didn't charge. My husband had lost some weight and wanted his wedding ring re-sized. Becky suggested he wait and see if he lost more weight before he got it re-sized. That was much appreciated as it told us they weren't out to just get our money.  Becky, Mary and Duke deserve a free lunch!! Everyone who works at Manning Jewelry are very polite, professional and friendly. I highly recommend Manning Jewelry to everyone.  Thank you for your fine service!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your excellent experience with Becky, Mary and Duke! We look forward to serving you again.

name: Beverly Hutson
text: Me and my husband stopped in there to have a new battery  put in my dad's watch.The lady was very nice. It has been a very long time since me and my husband have been in Mr.Manning store. My husband bought  our wedding rings from Mr.Manning  coming up on 36 years in May. Some of my family members have also done business with  Mr.Manning.

resp.text: We love that we're a part of so many people's stories, having been in business over 70 years! Thank you for sharing part of yours!

name: Moon Wolfy
text:
Lovely custom abilities, great selection, and true quality!
The fast service made our day!
Thank you Mary ❤

resp.text: It was my pleasure to meet you both and help you find the perfect band and pendant! Hope you have safe travels. stop in and see us again soon. Mary

name: Enrique Vazquez
text: I had my fiance's rings made there. She gets compliments on her engagement ring everywhere she goes. Impeccable craftsmanship from Mr. Manning, the staff is friendly, and prices are fair. Than you.

resp.text: The ring turned out so beautifully! We enjoyed working with you on your dream ring for your fiancé! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Barrett Lee
text:
This is an absolutely stunningly charming store located just off the square in downtown Foley. My first encounter with these fine folks was just  to get my favorite Fossil watch repaired a year or so ago. I have had a sorted history with this watch over the years with other jewelers in TN who have gouged me and taken upwards of six months to complete a job so now that I am a local here I wasn't sure what to expect from my local jeweler. Well these guys did a quick turnaround at a very reasonable price and not only replaced the stem but my  watch was so clean and polished that I did a double take because, at first, I thought they had given me a brand new watch by mistake. Nope, it is my watch and I could not have been happier.

Now as for the business, they have a wonderful selection of what you expect. Rings, watches, bracelets, earrings, etc. but they also have beautiful local artist pieces that are absolute stunning from inexpensive ocean themed pieces to a gorgeous diamond piece we just saw that range in prices into the thousands. They also buy gold and make custom pieces of your own design right in house.

We're here to yesterday to get my watch band repaired and they did it in minutes at no charge! That brings me to just how friendly, professional and all around terrific that everyone here, that I've encountered, are. I couldn't have asked to find a nicer group of folks in my new local jewelery store and I can assure that this a great place that I highly  recommend and that I will do all my jewelry business from now on!

Bottom line: they're great!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We love to help our guests and it makes us happy to make you happy! Your taking the time to share your thoughts is so appreciated! See you soon!

name: Mark Dohner
text: I am so grateful to Daniel for his help and his talent. He designed our wedding bands and did an incredible job. I didn't make things easy on him and decided that I wanted some changes to my ring. Daniel made them quickly and executed the changes flawlessly. He is a consummate professional and he clearly cares deeply about making his customers happy. We are thrilled with our choice to go to Manning Jewelry for such an important purchase!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your taking the time. We do not have a Daniel here, however, and would like to know which of our associates gave you great service so we can commend him! Can you please call us at (251) 943-4771 so we can clear up the name and thank you in person?

name: Aimee Morgan
text:
Manning is our go to for fine jewelry needs. I have used them to create a few custom pieces. Mr. Glen remounted an Atocha coin in a beautiful custom setting and is willing to think outside the box to make something unique.
Every experience I have had is excellent. Penny is the real gem here. She has helped my family choose and create personalized jewelry. Getting to know her has been a pleasure and has helped my husband with exquisite gifts that are exactly what I would choose for myself.
I highly recommend heading to Manning's. We love to shop local, their selection is on point, and every one in the store is knowledgeable and friendly. I will never go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you Aimee! Penny is a gem and we are so happy you love the gifts chosen for you! We look forward to your next visit.

name: Local Business
text: Mr. Manning is THE best custom jeweler in Baldwin County. Honest. Dependable. Extraordinarily creative with custom design

resp.text: Wow thank you!

name: Shannon Holland
text: I feel compelled to promote this business.  I had such an amazing experience at Manning.  Everyone that works there was friendly,  professional,  and knowledgeable.  They worked below my budget and produced the most beautiful piece of jewelry I have ever seen.  Every time I look at my finger I say, wow thats beautiful!  Thank you and I will certainly back!

resp.text: It's an awesome feeling to have something beautiful to look at right on your hand, isn't it? We are so pleased you are thrilled with your experience and finished piece! Look forward to seeing you again soon

name: Nicole Schreiber
text: I highly recommend Manning Jewelry! Glenn Manning and staff have always been so kind, proficient, and just truly exceptional with their customer service. Recently I had my wedding set remodeled and it turned out perfectly. The sketch I had of what I wanted on paper is now on my hand. I can't stop staring at my ring! Thank you Glenn and staff for everything! Including being patient with my two small children!

resp.text: We are so happy you love your ring! Thank you for letting us know you had a great experience! Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

name: LARRY GREEN
text: Wonderful, friendly staff.  Duke is an amazing designer. I highly recommend this place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your recommendation! We strive to make our customers happy.

name: Anayeli
text: The best customer service!!! My fiancee and I went to "look" and Mrs Loretta was so helpful from the start. She was very patient and took the time to explain the types of diamond cuts etc. I can't wait for my ring to be done so I can finally wear my custom ring!!!! Thank you Mrs.Loretta !!!

resp.text: Loretta is so friendly and helpful, we are glad you got to experience her excellent service! Thank you for being such a pleasure to serve!

name: George Douty
text:
The ONLY place to buy jewelry, in my opinion.  Fabulous, quality pieces. Something to buy every time I go in there.  (Their layaway is great!).
Duke, Loretta, and Mary are very helpful, knowledgeable, and very nice.
I don't know all the names of the staff, but everyone has been great.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for the very kind words!

name: Happy G
text: Mary helped us with a custom ruby and diamond ring that EXCEEDS our expectations. The owner Glen worked with us efficiently to develop the Computer Aided Design quickly, then showed us a 3-D view, built a 3-D printed model for fit, and then cast the gold setting and set the stones.... all in house... in short time, for comparable price to that of an off the shelf setting! What a pleasant and memorable experience.

resp.text: The pleasure was all ours! We so enjoyed working with you both! Wishing you an incredible Anniversary! We loved being a part of such a wonderful occasion. Thank you Glen and Mary

name: Tim
text: I recently walked into this lovely jewelry store to get a ring sized. The first person that greeted me was Loretta, she was amazing! Very friendly and very knowledgeable. Loretta sized the ring up for my gal and made sure we're 100% happy. Loretta explain the process of what's going to be done and even introduced us to the Goldsmith. I highly recommend this store to anybody looking to buy jewelry or a jewelry repair.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience. The ring turned out beautifully!

name: Kurt Hellmich
text:
If you need any custom work done please see Mrs Becky Green. She is out of this world and provides utterly superior customer service. She completely rebuilt a family heirloom ring for me. It was reshanked, repronged, the diamonds cleaned, and reset. The work was outstanding and had it ready before I left from vacation.

Give Mrs Becky a chance and you will not be disappointed!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Kurt for your kind and gracious words. It's always a pleasure to work with you and I know that you'll treasure that ring for years to come. You are the kind of customer that makes our job so enjoyable!

name: Lynne B
text: Worked with Penny Long. She was so helpful. I had a garnet ring which could not be repaired. She was able to get two new garnets for me to choose from. One was used to repair my ring. Then she suggested using the second stone for a custom necklace. It is simply beautiful. Thank you so much.

resp.text: Penny does a great job! We are so happy you love your new pieces!

name: Tracy M
text: We are so lucky to have found Manning Jewelry.  I was not finding anything I liked for an engagement ring in regular stores, and really worried that I was going to have to settle.  I found Manning Jewelry online, and read that they make custom design rings.  I found a ring online that I loved, and asked if they could make something like it, and was told Glenn Manning was confident he could.  Boy did he!!  My ring is AMAZING, and exactly what I wanted.  The whole process of designing the ring was so easy.  I kept saying "he gets it" throughout the whole process, because Mr. Manning completely understood my vision, and what I was looking for.  This ring is going to be such a special part of our lives forever, and I can't say enough how thankful we are that we were able to get it.  Thank you so much Manning Jewelry!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the confidence you had in Manning Jewelry to be a part of your special occasion. I enjoyed working with you and your fiance', and I am so glad we were able to make your vision a reality. We look forward to seeing you in the near future.

name: John Bednarczyk
text: Just had a bracelet made for my wife from an old necklace. The result is spectacular and fits perfectly.  Mr. Manning is an excellent goldsmith and meticulous in the details. The staff is a treat to work with, knowledgable and very pleasant.

resp.text: The bracelet turned out beautifully! So glad she loves it!

name: Joe Fannin
text: Manning’s is our favorite place to visit for jewelry. They set my wife’s first engagement ring for us and we recently upgraded that ring and had them reset the stone in a pendant. The people are super friendly and helpful. Duke redesigned my dad’s old ring to better suit my tastes and he did a fantastic job. Thanks to Loretta and the rest of the staff as well for all their helpful input. We highly recommend Manning for great service and quality.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experiences! We loved helping you and hope to see you again soon!

name: Edward Buker
text:
Manning Jewelry is just a wonderful and friendly family business. Helpful folks that are impeccably honest. It is a so much better customer experience to deal with owners and staff who care rather than a commercial chain jewelry store with off the street staff. We consulted with Glenn and  worked with April to have our jewelry appraised and cleaned. The work was professional and done on time. Just a pleasant experience start to finish. In
this hurried world, this business takes the time to do it right.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We appreciate your taking the time to share your thoughts, and look forward to seeing you again.

name: Dena Batterton
text:
While vacationing in Gulf Shores, Al in July 2020, I met a very nice lady by the name of Pepper. She lives in the condo complex where we were renting for the week. So I asked her if she could recommend a nice place to eat and if she knew of a good jeweler. She right away told us of some places to eat, then she called her jeweler friend Glenn Manning and got me an appt with him. She told me that Manning Jewelers’s has been in business for over 70 yrs. and how awesome everyone there is. And she was so right about that. And she showed me her beautiful ring that Glenn made for her.
Glenn took my old wedding and turned it into the most beautiful wedding ring I’ve ever seen. My husband and I were celebrating our 35th wedding anniversary in Gulf Shores. Because our trip to St Lucia was canceled due to Covid! And we had been planning to make some changes with my ring anyway, so this was the best time for us to do that. I believe God puts people in our life path for a reason. So meeting Pepper, then meeting Glenn was a huge blessing for us.
My husband was very impressed how Glenn designed my ring on his computer then made a resin ring to hold my stones so I could see how it would look and feel on my finger. I wanted to use my existing center stone as a side stone to represent our past 35 yrs of marriage, then added a new larger center stone for the present, and another side stone to match for the future. Then we decided to add a two sided ring guard using my existing ring guard diamonds. So not only did Glenn design a beautiful ring for me, he also saved us a lot of money. And he recommended a great company to insure my new ring with, which had a better price than our home owners insurance co.
I was very nervous about having my new ring shipped to me once it was done, just a few short weeks later, but Glenn put my mind at ease letting me know it will be insured and it came over night at my convenience. The whole process was Awesome! As well as the entire staff at Manning Jewelers. So if your heading to Gulf Shores, Al, or just looking for an Amazing  jeweler in that area, be sure to look up Manning Jewelers in Foley, Al. They are worth the drive from anywhere.
We also bought a really nice “flip flop” neck less for our daughter while we were in Manning’s  and she loves it. Plus Manning Jewelers’s also has a beautiful pendant called Stray Love that Glenn designed himself and he donates 20% of each sale to their foundation to help save stray animals. Best company to work with for all your jewelry needs.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Dena! We love designing custom pieces and seeing your dreams become reality. We are so happy Pepper sent you to us, and can't wait to see you again!

name: Donna Boswell
text: Have been going here for years for repairs and purchases. They never disappoint and are honest with estimates and all charges. Great people and great store!  Donna Boswell

resp.text: Thank you, Donna! We appreciate you sharing your thoughts and love our great customers!

name: dwdmn bailey1
text: Visiting Gulf Shores for my vacation and my eye glasses broke. Manning Jewelry was the only place that could weld my glasses back together. Amazing customer service! Would highly recommend!

resp.text: We are happy we were able to help you!

name: Sharon Mathews
text: I had a custom dinner ring designed and created at Manning. I was thrilled at the result and the customer service by Mary and  Glenn.

resp.text: Wonderful to hear you are thrilled with both your custom designed ring and the service you received from Mary and Glenn! Thank you so much for sharing, and can't wait to see you again!

name: Adrienne Boeschen
text: My engagement ring was designed at Manning. It was gorgeous, however my husband decided to add some more bling at Christmas. Duke outdid himself! It’s beautiful and just perfect. Luverne (sorry about the spelling) was also so incredibly helpful and sweet. Thank you, Manning Jewelry! I love, love, love it.

resp.text: We are so glad you love it! Thank you!

name: Juli Mack
text: The entire team at Manning is phenomenal, but Duke has personally created and repaired many pieces for me. The crown jewel so to speak was the engagement ring he custom made for my sons proposal. He searched high and low for the perfect stones and created a masterpiece. I trust them implicitly and would never go anywhere else. Their repairs are excellent and they are professional.honest and have the highest quality standards of anywhere I’ve ever been .

resp.text: Thank you for the kind compliments! We were so happy to help you! Congratulations to your son on his engagement.

name: Ally M
text: I had my necklace  fixed at Manning Jewelry not long ago. Great customer  service,  clean store, nice staff and good prices. I had it fixed for only $15! I was expecting  more than that and thought  they will make me order some parts or try to get more money from me but no, they were honest, professional  and fixed it cheaply. I was assisted   by  Brandy, very nice and professional  lady! Definitely will come back if I'll  need.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We look forward to helping you again soon.

name: Stacy Burgos
text: Just had my Engagement Ring and Wedding Band designed and custom made by Duke at Manning Jewelers!  It is absolutely beautiful and I love it!!  Great Job!  Every time I walked in, I was greeted with a smile and everyone was so nice and helpful.  I can't imagine every doing business elsewhere.  They have a customer for life!!!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience! Your ring turned out so beautifully and we are glad you love it!

name: Annie Parker
text: Whatever your jewelry need, Manning Jewelry never disappoints!  Thank you for the quick and friendly service in repairing my necklace while I waited!  I know everyone was busy but you took care of me with professionalism and friendliness!  The cookies were excellent as well!  Merry Christmas!

resp.text: Merry Christmas! Look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Mary Pariseau “Mary Liz Pariseau Slaton” Slaton
text: Master jewelry designers. I'm in awe of their merchandise. They set 2 pieces of my pink tourmaline into ear studs and did a fabulous job. I was tempted to empty out my savings for some of their custom pieces. Instead, I'm saving up like a good girl.

name: Bonita Snodgrass
text:
Our Family Jeweler for 35 years, Manning has sold, cleaned, repaired and restored heirloom pieces and made sure my personal design for my wedding ring was perfect.
The staff has never been less than stellar.
The jewelry is current AND deliciously vintage side by side.
Their displays inspire calm in myself and the girls, while also making my husband cringe.
It is handicapped accessible, impeccably clean (you'd think removing the drool and fingerprints would be a full time job alone!).
We, ok,  I have bought jewelry all over the U.S. and in 6 Countries, so when I tell you Manning never fails to impress I can assure you I know what I'm talking about.😉

resp.text: Thank you so much for the very kind words! We appreciate our customers so much! Looking forward to seeing you soon.

text: What a great place.We were warmly welcomed when we walked in. We were helped by Loretta. She was lovely and very friendly and knowledgeable.

text: My fiancé and I came to Manning's Jewelry during December 2018 to look at engagement and wedding rings. She answered all of our questions, then she made us aware of other options and opportunities that we had not considered. Charlotte and I want to thank Penny and the Manning staff for a job well done and for making their jobs seems like friendships and not jobs. text: Griffins Jewelers is a great place to shop.  It's like visiting family.  Locally owned and always willing to help.  If you have a specific need they can get it. name: John Poteracki
text:
While living in North Carolina, I knew that I would have several options when trying to decide where to buy an engagement ring. Every store wanted to offer me “the best deal” or “the perfect ring,” yet none felt right. That’s when I decided to listen to my family and friends and go with my hometown shop at Griffins Jewelers in Pell City, AL.

From the moment I walked through the door, I knew there was something special about this place. I was immediately greeted with smiles and a warm welcome. I was provided with all the knowledge to make my own decision on which ring I would like to purchase; I never felt pressured or forced to like a certain ring. The plentiful selection that Griffins offers is top notch and is sure to delight the toughest of critics. Best wishes for my upcoming proposal left me feeling confident and relieved knowing that I made a purchase from the best people in the industry.

Michael Abernathy and the knowledgeable staff at Griffins remain a vital part in our lives even after our wedding. My wife and I still frequent the store even though it is two hours away from our home in Georgia. There is no other place that I would rather shop or visit. Thanks Griffins Jewelers for such a wonderful experience!

name: Sharon Gant
text: All the girls in my family love Griffins’s Jewelers - that’s four generations! I personally have been a devoted customer for about forty years. They know me so well and exactly what I like; as far as I’m concerned, there’s one jewelry store in the world and that’s Griffins!❤️

They sent the ring off, had it repaired and cleaned, and it looked as good as new.  Fantastic service.  I highly recommend Michael and the team at Griffins.

text: This by far is the place to go for that special jewelry need. We have had the pleasure of shopping here for class rings and now engagement rings. My daughter was given a ring by her grandmother and a ruby was missing. Griffins took the time to search and find the right stone and color to make sure it matched. Attention to detail. Thank you Griffins for your help during these special times of our lives.

resp.text:
Hi Kecia,

Thank you so much for the kind words. It was our pleasure to help you with such a special piece of family jewelry. Every piece of jewelry has a wonderful story. We are so happy you allowed us to be a part of yours:)

Best regards,

Michael

name: Donna Johnson
text: Griffin's Jewelers always has a great selection and very good prices.  Everyone who works there is so friendly and helpful. I definitely recommend this store!

name: Katelyn Howard
text: Stopped by the Pell City store on a Saturday morning, we were greeted immediately. I was super excited and overwhelmed to be ring shopping, Michael made the experience super easy! I spent an hour or so trying on rings and learning all they had to offer as far as designing rings as well ....I finally tried on the one, I fell in love immediately. They were all very friendly at the store and never made me feel uncomfortable taking my time looking or asking questions. I had to get the ring resized and was able to pickup in 2 days. Amazing service and friendly staff, I will definitely be back and hope this helps someone make the decision to purchase your jewelry at Griffins!

name: Jillian Robertson
text:
After going to numerous big box jewelry stores in and around the Birmingham area with absolutely no luck of finding a ring I liked, I had started to feel that I would have to accept getting a style of engagement ring that I wasn't exactly happy with. Don't get me wrong, those rings were beautiful, but they seemed overpriced and all looked the same. Even after showing the employees of those stores pictures of rings that I did like, they would still come back with the same ole ring I just looked at. Some of those employees remained professional and would tell me that they didn't offer anything else, while some became very rude and seemed to take it personal that we didn't buy the ring immediately. It was becoming a very stressful and unenjoyable venture.

However, we luckily came across Griffin's Jewelers in Pell City after I searched for related images on Google. I had never been there and assumed that they probably had the same handful of rings all the other stores had, but was more than willing to give it a try.

I couldn't have been more wrong! We were very pleasantly greeted by Michael and Stephanie when we entered the store and they remained helpful and attentive without making us feel pressured to do anything. They have a large selection of rings and most of the rings were already unique in their own ways; meaning they actually have a large selection of Different rings! I showed them pictures of rings and because of their knowledge of jewelry in general, as well as their own inventory, they were able to quickly locate rings that had the features I was looking for. It definitely felt as though a weight had been lifted.

I ended up finding a ring that looked even more unique than the style I had originally been looking for and I love it! My fiance didn't complain about the price at all either; he was given a more than reasonable price and would have paid so much more for this ring elsewhere.

We're very grateful for Michael, Stephanie, and the everyone else at Griffin's Jewelers! We will continue to visit them for anything we need in the future.

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words, Jillian. It was our pleasure to help. It is always fun and satisfying when we can help you find “that special ring.”

We look forward to seeing again:)

All the best,

Michael and Stephanie

name: Victoria Brady
text: We went in to have something engraved and to buy a piece of jewelry for our new grandaughter.  We asked to talk with the engraver and looked at a child's bracelet while we waited. . He never came out and no one spoke to us at all. After being totally ignored by all staff members for about 20 minutes we left. I will shop somewhere else where my business is appreciated.

resp.text: Mrs. Brady I am so very sorry that you were unhappy with our in ability to get to you sooner. I apologize for that, but we were very busy when you were in the store. The engraver was already out front with a customer that arrived prior to you. When the engraver finished with the customer he was waiting on, he asked who was requesting him and you had already left. He was giving the prior customer the same attention that he was hoping to give you. We did have a shortage of staff today due to illness, I apologize. I am also sorry that you did not realize he was helping someone else, I am sure you would have understood had you realized such.  Congratulations on the arrival of your new granddaughter that is such a blessing! Again, I am sorry that our engraver could not get to you sooner. I am happy to talk with you by phone as I am hurt that you left feeling unappreciated, as that is never our desire! Please call 334-365-6552 and ask for Lynn.

text: Found a nice piece of jewelry as a birthday gift, and was very impressed by the courteousness and friendly sales attitude! My salesman was Randy,you guys should come by and see him! I will definitely be back and he has vast knowledge of all things jewelry!

resp.text: Thank you so very, very much for shopping with us and for leaving this very appreciated review. We hope to see you again real soon!

text: I had a great experience working with the professional and friendly staff at Bryan Jewelry! I highly recommend them and look forward to working with them again in the future!

resp.text: Thank you so very much for taking time to give us this very kind review. We look forward to working with you again soon!

name: JarHead
text: After I asked a few to many questions they started ignoring me.  To high of prices for my taste.  Better deals else where.

resp.text: Ernie, thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with us. We strive to provide all of our customers with the best customer service and quality product. Please get in touch with us on 334-365-6552 and we'd be happy to help you out.

name: Heather Cosby
text: Great customer service, quick jewelry repair, great work!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind, kind words. We appreciate you taking time for this review! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Gisette Greene
text: While I love the ring my husband picked out, I have to say this was one of the most unpleasant experiences I’ve ever had in a retail environment. I usually don’t like to post negative reviews but after hearing from multiple people that they experienced the same from here I felt I should. I instantly felt uncomfortable when I walked in. My husband had purchased my ring and I brought it in to get resized. That was my first visit and it was okay. They said to give them at least 5 days but I should receive it back sooner. 2 days later and they called back! I was thrilled! I was surprised how quickly the turnaround was. I left but the ring was too snug. I brought it back and the entire time the young lady was assisting me she seemed like I was a nuisance. Very unpleasant and I just couldn’t wait to get the heck out of there. Again, they had a very quick turnaround and when I walked in not one word was said to me. I walked up and I almost spoke first but I wanted to see how long this would last. FIVE employees there and not one spoke a word to me. When I got up to the counter still nothing was said. She handed me my rings and finally asked how they fit. Thankfully they fit perfectly and I never have to set foot in there again. Absolutely horrible service.

resp.text: We work hard to make all feel welcome and to provide excellent service. I sounds like we failed you and I am sorry! I do hope you will give us an opportunity to help you in the future. This will give us an opportunity to review all procedures. If you would like to speak to me in person, please come by or call 334-365-6552.

name: Hahna Burney
text: Fantastic customer service. Do yourself a favor and visit!!!!!

resp.text: You do us an honor, thank you!

name: Andrea Williams
text: I called this morning,  then decided to go in to have some engravings done. Everyone was so nice, helpful, as well as professional! I needed the engravings in connection to a birthday gift, and needed it done extremely last minute! I called several other places beforehand and was pretty much told by everyone that it was impossible to get done in the timeframe for which I needed it, and I even offered to pay a fee in order to have it rushed. The person I spoke with said that not only could they get it done within my timeframe, but also they would not charge me a fee for doing so. I thought it would take at least a day and a half, but Justin got it taken care of in just a couple hours for me. I really loved his work, and the pieces looked beautiful! I was really made to feel like I was an important customer,  and that my business was truly appreciated. I was very impressed by the pregnant lady as well as Justin, and I will definitely be recommending Brian jewelry in the future. Additionally, it will be my go to store for jewelry purchases and needs from here on out.

resp.text: Andrea, we are so happy you felt welcome and appreciated in our store! That is our great desire. We are so pleased you allowed us to help you make your birthday celebration be enhanced by our services. Also thank you for giving Justin and Kendall a shout out. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Roscoe
text: This is NOT the place to try and sell Gold at.  They offer far less than current value. Re reply: What a bunch of jokers "All of our offers are fair and honest"  Fair offer it was not.  Everyone else pays within $10 of current spot values. Crazy.

resp.text: For over 63 years Bryan Jewelry has been one of the most trusted names in jewelry in the Prattville region. While we do buy Gold, we must inspect any and all products before we purchase them, upon looking at your product it was concluded that you had bullion. For your bullion we offered 75%, which was disclosed to you before the offer was made.  For any customer we will make an offer and it's up to the customer to make the decision to sell. All of our offers are fair and honest. It is with this policy coupled with our years of experience and services that have built a legacy of integrity and trust with our customers.

text: Lynn and her staff have a great rapport with their customers. I began coming here since I moved to Prattville. I love the store.

name: Chris Buchanan
text: For years now I've been coming to Bryan Jewelry. Whether I need something repaired or I'm looking for something new I know they're the people to come to. Everything I've gotten has been beautiful and a quality piece.

name: Randy Constancio
text: Worst jewelry store ever. Hateful staff and liars. Will NEVER go back here!

resp.text: Randy I am distressed to receive your review. I have asked for clarification from my staff and searched our data base to find any encounter that would have resulted in your disappointment. At this point I remain puzzled. Please feel free to give us a call and ask for me, Lynn Bryan Young.

name: Tyler Brannon
text: I had my girlfriends engagement ring hand made here and it was less expensive than I could find any where else. The quality and service was incredible.

name: Douglas Coleman
text: I am beyond thrilled with the selection they offer. I absolutely love what I purchased, I also have to say the staff is very knowledgeable and friendly.

name: Janie Marsh
text: The staff at this jewelry store are outstanding and truly know what they are talking about. Their knowledge about each item is incredible.

name: JessicaDuffey 91
text: Had a very nice experience, I had a watch engraved for my husband and it was beautiful.

name: Mick Norris
text: High quality jewelry at a great price and friendly, helpful service!

name: Peggy Morton
text: I have been going to this jewelry store for quite some time, they fix my jewelry as well purchasing watches and rings. The staff is beyond friendly and helpful!

name: Dama Darby
text: Excellent family and always beautiful work and repairs.

name: Melinda Rogers
text: Great staff and a great selection!

name: jon sanders
text: Don't go here to get any work done if you expect them to tell you the truth..

resp.text:
Jon,

We also appreciate feedback from our customers on every level. We've extensively checked our database and have no record of a client by your name. For over 63 years Bryan Jewelry has been one of the most trusted names in jewelry in the Prattville region. We ask that if there was truly an issue with the service you received from our company that you call and / or visit the store directly and ask to speak to the Owner Lynn. Thank you

name: Jennifer Flores
text: I had a great experience working with the staff at Ware Jewelers at Eastchase last week. I appreciated the team work and hospitality they extended to us. They are very knowledgeable and provide excellent customer service! Please visit them for your next jewelry or watch purchase!

name: Maureen Montgomery
text: Awesome staff and so easy to work with! We will be back.

name: John Hartman
text: Cheri and the team at Ware Jewelers are amazing! Their customer service and attention to detail is what really sets them apart. In need of a beautiful piece of jewelry for that special occasion? Have a family heirloom in need of repair? Do yourself a favor and go to Ware Jewelers, you'll be glad you did!

name: John Franklin
text: Excellent service and quality. I had ordered a signet ring for my daughter from another store and they totally messed up. They had 2 months to complete the order and told me a week before my daughters birthday the ring would be another 2 weeks. So, I went to Wares Jewelers in Eastchase and Cheri found me what I wanted and it was ready in 2 days. Totally professional, thank you Cheri and Wares Jewelers for coming through.

name: Chrissy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Carol Roberts
text: Ware Jewelers is one of the few places locally you can take a Rolex for factory approved service. I believe they send the watches to their Auburn location and they are serviced there. They are also a Rolex retailer so you can buy the brand there. I have taken two rings to be sized but unfortunately they charge for sizing based on how many stones are in the ring and it gets really expensive for just a tiny adjustment. That said, I believe them to be a reliable and trustworthy jeweler.

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words, Carol!  You are correct, our CW21 watchmaker in Auburn handles many of our Rolex repairs in house, although we always keep channels open to send watches directly to Rolex in the event that is determined to be necessary or a faster turnaround for you.

I absolutely understand your concern about how our sizing is priced, so I want to help you understand why we have to take the number of stones into account.  Whenever a jeweler sizes a ring, they then have to follow up on their work by checking each individual stone and tightening it, which can become very labor intensive when you are dealing with rings that have a large number of tightly spaced stones down the shoulder and onto the shank.  When it's all said and done, our objective is to make sure that when you get your ring back, you can wear it with full confidence that everything will remain where it belongs, from the ring on your finger down to the smallest stone on the shank.

Again, thank you so much, and I hope that helps clarify our policies a bit for you!

name: John Davis
text: I have exclusively shopped at the Eastchase Ware for all of my jewelry needs for the past 7 years. Their staff is very knowledgable and are always willing to take the time in order to assist me in finding the perfect gift. In fact, it is this personable approach that keeps me coming back. A typical "chain" jewelry store, they are not. The family owned atmosphere is proudly displayed as they are more concerned with what jewelry best fits my needs rather than what jewelry they want to sale. I guess that is really what makes Ware the place I want to shop...I am dealing with an individual who wants to assist me in my jewelry purchase as opposed to a sales person.

resp.text: Thank you very much, John!  It means everything to us to know that you've been treated so well, and have entrusted us with your loyalty as a result.  That's the sort of ethic that's kept us in business for the past 70 years, we always want to make sure that you are happy with every part of your experience when you come to visit us.

name: Leigh Quinney
text: Allison and Cheri have helped me refurbish family pieces, design custom pieces and choose new items over the years.  I would never trust anyone else to help make such special purchases and important decisions. Love them!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Leigh!  Allison and Cheri are both amazingly dedicated to their clients, and I'm glad you've had such a wonderful, long-standing relationship with them!

name: Andi Lee
text: My favorite local jewelry store. Everytime I'm in the store, I feel very welcome. Plus the service is good too. I bent my ring and I was so nervous that I would have to pay a lot to get it fixed. But I took it to them and it was barely 2 minutes before I had my ring back in excellent condition for free. It wasn't perfect, but it gave me peace of mind. He did warn me there would be a chance of it breaking, but luckily it didn't. And it wasn't even a ring from the store. I was so pleased.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Andi!  I'm glad we were able to help put your ring straight.  As you've discovered, we're always happy to take a look and see if we can help, regardless of whether your jewelry came from us or not.  There is very little we can't work on.

name: Mark Free
text: I would follow Cheri Jordan anywhere she goes.   She is the most knowledgeable in the market place......and always a joy to work with.   Ware Jewelers is lucky to have her........Customer Service is always tops at Ware

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mark!  I completely agree, Cheri is one of a kind and we are so lucky to have her as part of our family here!

name: Dancing Llamas
text: It was wonderful. Chris and and all the staff have been helpful and very polite. Thanks guys!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Fred!  We appreciate your feedback!

name: Raquel Anecito
text: Alexandra is an amazing sales person. She took care of all my needs. I recommend her next time you go.

resp.text: Thank you, Raquel!  Alexandra's one of the newest members of the Ware family, but she's settled in fast and we're expecting great things from her!

name: Cherie Dunn
text: I absolutely love the engagement ring my husband got at Wares. Thelma is wonderful and always remembers us when we go in the store!!

resp.text: Thank you, Cherie!  Thelma's in a league of her own when it comes to her memory for people.  I don't think I've ever seen her forget a face, and she's always using that talent to be mindful of what her customers want, as you've experienced first-hand!

name: Mary Anne Perkovich
text: Super friendly and knowledgeable staff! They are always willing to go the extra mile to make sure their customers are happy!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mary Anne!  We're always striving to make sure everyone who comes through our doors is treated like family!

name: Holly Butler
text: Great service! Had a ring sized and repaired. Beautiful work! Would recommend to everyone!  They really care about their customers!

name: Cristin JOSHUA
text: Wares jewelry stores provides more details to customers .Their products are of high quality value....I choose Wares as number one store.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Cristin!  We do pride ourselves on not just helping our customers find what they want, but also helping them to understand exactly what they're getting by explaining all the terms and ratings used in fine jewelry, and how that applies to their individual piece.

name: Angela Louviere
text:
While sharing time between my two sons and their activities this weekend, I made it a point to visit the store. My son will receive a Rolex watch for his upcoming college graduation. While he is very opinionated about the watch that he would like, I wanted to make sure that it wouldn’t be too big. Upon arriving, DeeDee greeted me with warmth and a friendly smile. She gladly showed me a Rolex to help me understand the sizing. My son met me a few minutes later.  He was very pleased to be able to try on a few watches and discuss the differences with DeeDee. He also told us that he didn’t think that he could try them on because earlier in the day, Thelma refused to show him and his dad any. I was very surprised to learn this since I had just encountered a great salesperson who was so helpful.
I didn’t even know that they had gone shopping! They were doing research too.
DeeDee has me considering a Rolex for myself (though I do love my Breitling!) and I will definitely want to work with her again.
Upon leaving, my son told me that Thelma wouldn’t even discuss the Deep Sea with them. She simply replied, ‘There’s a waiting list for those.’ He was very glad that he returned this evening and I’m so glad that he met me at the store and had a great experience instead of dismissing them all together. I hope to return soon and be able to purchase his watch (or maybe mine!!) and it will definitely be with DeeDee!

name: noel crenshaw
text: Alexander anecito is amazing I got everything taken care of that I needed to take care of for my wedding set

resp.text: Thank you, Noel!  Congratulations on your nuptials!

name: Katherine Reifenberg
text: My fiancé and I shopped with Ware Jewelers for my engagement ring and wedding band. Allison listened to exactly what we wanted and found the perfect band.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Katherine!  Allison really does have a gift for helping people find just what they're looking for.

name: c richert
text: Was very pleased with the patience and professionalism shown by DeeDee Johnson my Jewelry Consultant.  I did visit several jewelry stores before my purchase from Ware Jewelers in Montgomery, AL.  The service received was the main reason for my returning to Ware to buy my ring.

resp.text: Thank you very much!  We're very pleased to hear you had such a good experience working with DeeDee and that she's earned your confidence.  We'll strive to meet and exceed that expectation in the future.

name: Mike Johnson
text: Great brands on display and wonderful service.

resp.text: Thank you, Mike!

name: Matthew M
text: Amazing and very knowledgeable staff.

resp.text: Thank you, Matthew!

name: Jack English
text: Sarah Reid was very helpful and communicative.  My fiancé loves her ring. I would highly recommend Ware Jewlers in Spanish Fort along with Sarah!

resp.text: Jack, Thank you for your kind words.  We are a family owned business and your review is very much appreciated. Kind Regards, Ronnie Ware

name: Bailey Hall
text: I wish i knew about Ware Jewelers sooner!  My boyfriend purchased another David Yurman bracelet for me for Christmas, so I brought my older bracelets into have them cleaned. We have always ordered online but always ran into issues with their customer service. I will never order online again. All the girls as so accommodating and very knowledgeable! Overall amazing service and I will definitely be back for some more David Yurman!

name: Chrissy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Laura T
text:
Having known of the store, and family while living in Auburn,  I was excited when we got our store here!
I have had nothing but excellent service, whether it's been a piece purchased from Ware's or not.
There is nothing like unwrapping a present to discover the gift underneath is in a green Ware's Jewelry box!

name: Laurie Jewell
text: I walked in and was greeted from the back of the store where an employee asked what she could help me with...I walked to the back where she stood behind the desk to ask if they could size a ring.  She immediately says they are not taking any outside sizing orders till after the new year.  She was very passive and not overly friendly.  As I was leaving I saw a case of David Yurman and asked her across the store if they carried any of the morganite...she never came over to the case and just stated they did not.  I was so put off by her service that I will not be back to ever make a purchase here.

name: Hey you
text: Visited this store to ask pricing on changing a watch battery and the cost for resizing it.  We were told they could not help us till after the new years which we found strange.  We received a pretty cold reception and they didn't seem to happy to see us.  Needless to say, as much as my husband and I love purchasing jewelry, we will not be returning to this store.

name: Matt Hudson
text: I recently purchased a watch and was assisted by an associate by the name of Meghan Hawkins.  Not only was she very informative, but she made the selection and purchase process very easy!  I recommend anyone in the market for jewelry and/or watches to stop by this location and see Meghan!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Matt!  We're glad you had such a good experience with Meghan.  She really puts her all into taking care of her customers!

name: seXy KNEEs
text: Fast, friendly, and efficient service. We love the ring!

resp.text: Thank you very much!

name: David Howery
text: This business has been closed for over three years.

name: Second Grade LE
text: Wonderful jewelers. Very efficient in repairing a ring I purchased from Ware Jewelers several years earlier. Excellent service. Would highly recommend. My husband and I have been going to Ware’s since 1975. We now live out of state, but continue to purchase our jewelry from there.

name: Dan Cocks
text: Mine was a simple request to replace a watch battery. Because it is considered a “premium” watch, a jeweler that sells that brand tried to charge me $100 for “lifetime battery replacement”. I walked out of there and came here the next time I came back to Auburn. This was exactly as you would hope and expect of a Jewry store. They were polite, pleasant, helpful, and fair in their pricing. Why bother to write a review for a battery replacement?  Because I have come to appreciate that not all jewelers are the same.

name: Joann Hill
text:
Love Ware Jewelers! They are the best...Jo at Tigertown store is excellent and goes all out to help you find exactly what you want. She also keeps in touch after the purchase to make sure all is well!
Very pleasant experience...every time!!

name: Deirdre Gunn
text: Ware Jewelers has been my most trusted jewelers since I was in school at Auburn in 1983! If I need work done, or appraisals, I wouldn’t dream of going anywhere else. They are always courteous and kind, and very professional, and I know I can depend on their honesty as well.

name: Catherine Bower
text: My wedding and engagement ring are both from Wares. I had so much fun picking them out. Bailey is absolutely wonderful to work with!

resp.text: Thank you Catherine, we loved helping you!

name: yak bama
text: Had a ring of my husband’s grandmother and my wedding ring made into a new ring together. They did a fabulous job of helping me designing it and when it was completed it was more than I hoped for. I absolutely love it and have gotten so many compliments on it. Will you Ware Jewelers for all my jewelry needs.

name: Terri McCard
text: Fast and affordable local service!

name: Michael Watson
text: Always receive prompt, outstanding service. Lindsay and Jennifer are especially attentive to their customers.

name: cynthia williams
text: I stumbled across Ware Jewelers by accident after moving from Florida. I needed a ring sized up from size 2 to size 6. The ladies there helped me & were professional, welcomed me to area. My ring turned out nice & they cleaned it beautifully. I would definitely recommend this jewelry store. I will be returning for any Jewelry purchases & or jewelry repair.

name: Tonjia Young
text: Awesome customer service!! These ladies customer service skills are the BEST!!

name: Choices Transportation
text: Hands down one of the best.. Thanks for everything ladies..

name: Patsy White
text: Everyone meets you with a smile and Jo is always ready to help in any way!

name: Louellen Stoner
text: I needed a battery for my watch and when I took it in they were very friendly and attended to me very quickly. I left the watch with them and they called me when it was ready for pickup. When I went to pick it up, they went beyond just replacing the battery, they cleaned and polished the watch itself. I was very satisfied with all they did and would recommend them to anyone.

name: Maureen Montgomery
text: Awesome staff and easy to work with, we will be back!

name: Darby Winkler
text: I had the best experience at Ware. The staff was so welcoming and kind. We worked with Jo and she really took the time to get to know us and went above and beyond to make sure we were happy. I would recommend Ware to anyone!

name: Debora Nichols
text: The staff is always friendly, courteous and helpful. All services have been rendered professionally and items are ready by scheduled pick up date.

name: Ray Smith
text: Always a pleasure, friendly courteous service

name: TJ Fuqua
text: Always a huge help when I come in!  Very knowledgeable and accommodating.  These ladies make what can be an intimidating experience easy for you.  I highly recommend them!

name: Madelyn Candler
text: My sister and I brought in several pieces of pearl jewelry that had belonged to our mother. We wanted to repurpose the pieces into pieces that we thought would appeal to my daughters and my sister’s daughter-in-law. Emily met with us and listened to all we had to say about the styles we were looking for. Together we came up with designs that we thought each of the girls would like. When we went to pick them up, she had not made the final piece. After looking at all the others she felt that the design of the design of last piece was not comparable to the others and she feared we would not be satisfied. She had a new design drawn up for us to consider.  She was absolutely right; the original design needed the changes she made. We appreciate that she cared enough to wait on that last piece. As it turned out, that design became my favorite. Emily truly created beautiful pieces that we feel reflect the personalities of each girl.  There is no way our experience could not have been improved upon.

name: Daphne Davis
text: Took two weeks longer that promised to restring necklace.

name: Bertha Cade Clark
text: My watch needed a battery and when it was ready I received a call. Thank you Ware Jewelers.

name: John Guisinger
text: I went there to get a sterling silver chain for my Saint Christopher necklace. They ordered me a chain in the length that I wanted and when it came in they attached the medallion to it. They even polished it up to where it looked better than it ever has. All of the women that work there are very friendly and helpful. I'll definitely go back again for all of my jewelry needs. I highly recommend them!

name: Christina Mitchell
text: I walked into this store with my daughter looking for a certain item. The line is no longer carried, but I was directed to other items that were perfect for what I was looking for. I asked my daughter if that was what she wanted Santa to bring and the kind lady kept it going. When the item arrived in the store, she called and said Santa delivered an item. I was impressed she remembered after all the people she’s helped during that week. She was not available when I arrived at the store, but everyone was extremely friendly and helpful while I was in the store. I ended up buying another item while I was there and I left completely satisfied with the service I received. I would definitely recommend this store to others for the spectacular customer service.

name: Chrissy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. They are very much appreciated especially during this time. Please contact us if we can do anything for you.

name: April Aker
text: Ware Jewelers is quite possibly the best! Every one is friendly and helpful.  They remember their customers by name! That is important to me. This is why I shop only at Ware Jewelers!

name: Maggie Webb
text: My husband bought my rings from Ware's from Jennifer Chastain. Everyone there is amazing. We have talked to several people who have all been so helpful. One of my diamonds fell out of my band, and I was devastated. When I went in, they were very comforting and fixed it for free! I was going on a vacation the next week, and they gave me a ring to wear while I was on vacation. I will not buy jewelry from anywhere else because Ware's will take care of you.

name: Cynthia Ford
text: ALL the employees are so very nice and helpful. I bought several gifts there last week and Lindsey helped me find exactly what I wanted. Even had to make an exchange a few days later, and Lindsey didn’t seem to be bothered by it at all. I really did feel like I was the most important customer in the store.

name: Louis Clough
text: I’ve had the wonderful experience working with Ware Jewelers. Their staff is always eager to help in anyway possible. A top notch jeweler.

name: Richard Loftis
text: Very well run with great salespersons truly anxious to assist one with a smile. Wouldn’t shop anywhere else!

name: Colleen Mccann
text: Jo and all of the staff at Ware Jewelers in the Tiger Town location are so sweet! They clean my jewelry while I was there and have an amazing selection of fine jewelry and gifts.

name: Kay McClain
text: What an amazing store with amazing service. I cannot say enough about the service. They have a wonderful selection of jewelry, china, and gifts. However, if you can't locate what you need that is not very helpful. The folks that work there are so familiar with the inventory that you can just describe something and they appear with it. They remember their clients and send emails when items arrive that might be of interest. I have gotten reminders of sales and the items on sale that would interest me. They have special ordered pieces of jewelry for me to my delight. Their watch repairs service is also excellent. If I need a gift, I can find something there! It is far more than a jewelry store. I can't say enough about all the services available and the helpful staff!

resp.text: Thank you, Kay!  We really do try to go the extra mile, and it's wonderful to know how appreciated that is.

name: John Dennett
text: Outstanding service with a pleasant and professional staff!

name: Rootietoot Toot
text: They were very helpful. I had some rings resized and they did a perfect job, even cleaned and polished them!

name: Owen Smith
text: Wares Jewelry cares about their customers.  Not only are they professional, they are prompt and efficient.  Their many years of serving the Lee County area is proof of their continued commitment of satisfaction.

name: Jerry Robison
text: Quick and excellent service on my watch.  Looks like new again.  Very friendly staff.

name: David Whitten
text: It has been my experience that whatever in the line of jewelry I want or need, Ware Jewelers is the place to go.  I have lived and worked in Auburn for fifty years and one of the first people I met when moving here in 1968 was Lamar Ware.  He was a man of character who established his business to reflect his high standards.  Lamar is gone but his family maintains the high standards that he put into place years ago.  I am leaving Alabama and regret leaving behind a firm that I could always depend on.

resp.text:
David,
Thank you for your excellent review, it is very much appreciated!  We are always just a phone call or email away !  Wish you the best!
Kind Regards,
Ronnie Ware

name: Clint Taylor
text:
My wife and I bought our wedding rings there in 1977 and have enjoyed doing business with them over the years. A wonderful hometown company.
Clint Taylor

name: Pludie Buckley
text: They are very friendly and very helpful,but I went in to have a coin engraved and they didn't engrave it. They glued an engagement on the coin. My husband was disappointed because he was afraid it would eventually come off.

resp.text:
Pludie,
Good Morning! We do not show a transaction under your name. We can engrave coins. Please call Ronnie Ware at Ware Jewelers in Auburn Alabama 334-821-7375

name: Laura Stephens
text: Literally the worst store on the planet. They lost my grandmothers pearl necklace clasp in the restringing of the pearls. It was the only piece of jewelry she ever gave me upon my high school graduation. They were brought back from the war by my grandfather. The clasp is what dated the pearls and proved their history.  They also cut my best friends diamond setting to force a diamond that didn’t fit into the ring and it fell out. The list goes on and on. Plus their prices are ridiculous. Go to Solomon brothers in Atlanta before you trust these people with anything!!!!!!!! Also, If you get your pearls restrung there, they take them out of the store and they go to “Jo’s home, “ which is just totally unprofessional on every level.

name: Rebecca Palmer
text:
The lovely ladies at the Tiger Town location took great care of my repair job. I needed to have a ring sized correctly after a previous Jeweler had botched the job. It took me 3 months at the other place to get my ring back and it was wrong, but it only took me 3 days to get the correct size at Ware. Their Jeweler is awesome, and their staff is stellar.
UPDATE: once again the lady jeweler at Tiger Town location saves the day by sizing up my granddaughter's new ring in record fast time. Thanks Ms. Robin, it looks beautiful.

name: Cody B Van Houten
text: I have been shopping at Ware Jewelers all my life. As have my parents, and grandparents did. I trust no one else with my jewelry needs. Whether it be purchasing new pieces or servicing prior purchases, or maintaining my families jewelry. I trust no one else.

name: Ouida Webb
text:
Happiness is a gift box from Ware Jewelers!! Sometimes, the smallest boxes have the best surprises!!
Seriously, I love shopping at Wares. The stores are beautiful and so is their inventory. Customer service has always been awesome, regardless of whether I'm just browsing to ooh and ahh or shopping with a purpose! I enjoy every unique piece of jewelry I've purchased as well as items for my home. It is always easy to find a gift for someone, and my daughters get just as excited as I do when receiving a box wrapped in Ware's gift wrap!  I've shopped at Ware Jewelers for almost 40 years and look forward to 40 more!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ouida!  We love hearing about families that come to us across entire generations.  It really helps remind us of our own family ties, and how deep our roots are in the community!

name: Stephanie Randall
text: Repaired my rings so beautifully  they look brand new! Friendly staff and excellent customer service! Would recommend  to everyone!

name: Patti G. Reaves
text:
Went in the Tiger Town location to have a battery replaced in my watch. The young lady, Maddie, that helped me was very kind and courteous.
The reason for only 3 stars....it took a week for them to replace the battery.

name: Allen Lott
text:
Wife lost ear ring. Called Jo and explained situation. Birthday was in 10 days and I wanted a setting and diamond to match.
They came through and thier in house jeweler
Did a great job.

name: Sara Lee
text: Great workmanship on soldering my rings together and wonderful customer service!

name: Evelyn Mickle
text: Very helpful  staff,  good evaluation, price for repair reasonable,  quick service great work  very happy. With results

name: Tiffany Cole
text:
I had to have a set of pearls restrung for a second time.  The service was fabulous and she worked to find a way that would not cost me as much as it did the first time but will also provide greater strength in hopes of not breaking again.

The employees were friendly and professional!

name: Courtney Dios
text: Provided exceptional help with finding the perfect wedding ring and band for my husband. They were patient and willing to work with you until you found the perfect setting and diamonds. Would highly recommend their services as they were the best around Auburn hands down.

resp.text: Thank you, Courtney!  That's exactly the experience we hope people have when they come to see us, regardless of what they're looking for (but I'd be lying if I said I wasn't a bit sentimental about engagement rings and wedding bands).

name: Rhonda Beadles
text: I had my watch band adjusted. Ware Jewelers is always my go to jewelry store. While I was there I found a gift for my first grandchild coming in December. They wrapped it beautifully for no extra charge. I love shopping there!!

name: JULIAN WHITTEN
text: Jennifer Chastain was most helpful and a pleasure to work with.

name: Patricia Frazier
text: The staff was friendly and very professional when I was looking for diamond earrings for my daughters birthday. She absolutely loves them and I will definitely visit this location and staff again for my jewelry needs.

name: Brooke Perkins
text: Always had great experiences working with Ware Jewelers. This is a great honorable company and has wonderful employees. Jo and Robin at the Tigertown location are the ladies I do most of me business with, but everyone there is pleasant and ready to help you with all your jewelry needs. Go see them. You will NOT be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you, Brooke!  Jo and Robin really do head up an amazing store over at Tiger Town, and it's always good to know people are having wonderful experiences working with them day in and day out!

name: Linda Jordan
text: Well pleased with the work done on my Rolex.Thank you!

name: Stephanie Wilbanks
text: This place is awesome. They were so helpful and patient with me when I changed my mind 200 times. They finally found me the perfect ring! I couldn't be happier!

name: Judy Miller
text: Robin was so helpful and offered suggestions without being pushy. She repaired my engagement ring and had it ready to pick up in one day! Thanks to her expert cleaning, my rings look new and my diamond is sparkling!

The first is top quality merchandise because it is important to know that craftsmanship and materials will last a lifetime.
The second is a personal relationship with the store staff. They understand my tastes and they do not try to push me towards something just for the sake of a quick sale. If I visit Ware, I might ask to see three or four pieces and buy nothing at the moment. Nevertheless, they are always gracious.

name: Caroline K
text: I really enjoy this store with their diverse and elegant products. However, I am so disappointed in how they are treating this pandemic. Only TWO of their employees were properly wearing masks when I went to have a watch serviced, whereas the other six employees had their masks below their chins. As someone who is immune compromised and takes a risk simply leaving the house, I felt like their business had ZERO regard for my safety. I couldn’t wait to get out of the store. I will not be supporting their business again, especially as there are many other jewelers in the area that are following the mask ordinance and keeping their patrons safe.

resp.text: Caroline, we are so sorry to hear this, but thank you for bringing it to our attention! I will personally make sure our store manager sees your message and addresses this issue to keep our customers safe. We sincerely apologize for making you feel unsafe, and we do hope you'll visit our stores again. We can certainly schedule virtual appointments and curbside pickup for anyone who is immune compromised or feels safer away from crowds during this unprecedented time. Again, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention!
