name: Sam Keske
text: Got my wife's engagement ring here while we were both in grad school at Auburn, and still enjoy visiting with everybody when we visit. The signature jeweler in Auburn, and family owned for many years - you may even catch Ronnie Ware on a good day. Great for Tacori, Rolex, John Hardy, etc., down to Christmas ornaments and glassware.

name: Cindy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Anwar LNU
text:
Met Lisa on my most recent visit to Auburn.  I am in the market for a Rolex and she was the consumate professional, extremely knowledgeable, charming and polite.  She educated me regarding the demand for these timepieces and wished me well even though she didn't have what I wanted at the time.
Would definitely suggest a visit to Ware Jewelers if you are in the market for a Rolex and definitely ask for Lisa!

name: Scott Holley
text: I have been doing business with Ronnie and Tina for 20 years. They have great merchandise and service. They are always so helpful. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Tammy Benda
text: I love working with family businesses that treat you right and value your business.  Ware is one of the best!  The jewelry is what brought me in.  The people make it the only place I will shop for jewelry again.

name: Laura Stephens
text: Literally the worst store on the planet. They lost my grandmothers pearl necklace clasp in the restringing of the pearls. It was the only piece of jewelry she ever gave me upon my high school graduation. They were brought back from the war by my grandfather and given to my grandmother. The clasp is what dated the pearls and proved their history.  They also cut my best friends diamond setting to force in a diamond that didn’t fit into the ring, and shortly after, the diamond fell out... the list goes on and on. Plus their prices are ridiculous. Go to Solomon brothers in Atlanta before you trust these people with anything!!!!!!!! We are totally heartbroken over the pearls and wouldn’t want anyone else to ever experience that!

name: Austin Till
text: McKee is absolutely wonderful and the biggest help I could have ever asked for. I go to her for all my gift needs. You won't be disappointed with her friendly, Grade A service.  If you're looking for someone helpful, look no further. I will continue to be a Ware customer as long as McKee is employed there.

name: Carol Roberts
text: I live in Montgomery but while I was in Auburn I went by Ware's to see if they could adjust the band on a Cartier watch I was wearing. Ware's doesn't sell Cartier, but I know they sell and repair Rolexes so I felt confident in their ability to work on my Cartier. They did a quick and excellent job, of course. One of these days I'm going to get one of their Auburn watches!

resp.text: Thank you, Carol!  It's always a pleasure to be of service.

name: Parker Johnston
text: I had a very good experience at Ware today.  Worth the trip over from Columbus.  Justin fixed my watch while I waited and it looks great.  Thanks and great job!

resp.text: Thank you, Parker!  We're glad to know it was worth the trip.  We appreciate you going out of your way to entrust your watch to us!

name: Ben McCoy
text: I have bought all my wife's jewlery here even living in another state I always come back!  Jo is the best at keeping me out of the dog house!  They have the best prices and make sure everything is perfect!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben!  Jo does have a talent for helping pick out just the right gift to help soothe the raging seas.

name: Michele Kostelecky
text: We loved our experience at Ware Jewelers!  Thank you so much for being so kind and helpful to us.  Lisa Stevens was great and making us feel at ease and comfortable in our purchases and decisions.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Michelle!  Lisa's a real gem, and we're glad you had such a wonderful experience working with her.

name: Lexie McCormick (Lexie)
text: Ware Jewelers is the only jewelry store I will shop at. Everyone is so nice and you get help as soon as you walk in the doors! They have the prettiest jewelry I have ever seen.

resp.text: Thank you, Alexis!  We always want to make everyone feel right at home when they come through our doors!

name: Paul Berngard
text: Amazing experience.  Lisa is excellent and gives the best customer service.   Have purchased numerous timepieces from her and will only go through her for future buys.   If you are looking to get a Rolex or any other piece of fine jewelery do not hesitate to go see Lisa.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Paul!  We agree completely that Lisa's service and knowledge are top-of-the-line, and we count ourselves lucky to have her.

name: J Sims
text: Went in with my Girlfriend this evening looking for engagement rings for her. Was served by Jennifer, her service was superb. And the selection was just as fantastic. Will definitely be purchasing my rings from Wares.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  I know Jennifer will be thrilled to help you find the perfect ring when the time comes!

name: Kimberly Burns
text: Friendly & helpful customer service. Beautiful jewelry. I've been a loyal customer for over 30 years!! Love Ware Jewelers!!  😀

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kimberly!  It means the world to us that you've trusted us for so long!

name: Ann Canon
text: Wares has been, in my opinion, the top jewelry store in the southeast. When I need to shop for jewelry or for gifts I always shop there first. My mother never shopped anywhere else for wedding gifts.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ann!  It really means the world to us to hear from our long-standing clients.  You and your mother really exemplify the kind of local connections that have kept us in business for 70 years now.

name: Luis Dopico
text: Ware Jewelers is absolutely the best jewelers. I have tried several other jewelers since moving away from Auburn and I have never had the same level of service and quality. Now, I will only go to Wares for new items or repair or redesign of older items. I have learned my lesson. It doesn't pay to go anywhere else. Also, I wanted a custom piece made and the jewelers at Ware's exceeded anything I could have ever imagined. They don't just create jewelry, they create memories. Thanks to Lisa Stevens who is absolutely amazing to work with and will do whatever it takes to make sure you find exactly the special piece you are looking for!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Luis!  It means the world to us that you've been so satisfied with our services for so long.  We'll do our best to keep exceeding expectations and hope to keep you happy for many years to come!  And lest I forget, yes, Lisa really does go above and beyond to make sure her clients get taken care of.  We're glad you've gotten to experience that first hand!

name: Chennan Xue
text: Very helpful and friendly staffs. Helped me adjust my watch strap (actually twice) and didn't charge me. Thank you!

resp.text:
Thank you for your excellent review, it is very much appreciated! We are always just a phone call or email away ! Wish you the best!
Kind Regards,
Ronnie Ware

name: Melissa Warnke
text: Tina and Ronnie helped us find exactly what we wanted, and their customer service is unmatched! Thank you for making our experience so great!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Melissa!  It was a pleasure having you in, and we loved helping you!

name: Judith Jones
text: Always helpful. Always kind!  Great inventory!!!  I use their lawaway service every year and start my Christmas shopping early!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Judith!  The layaway plan really is a great option for keeping on top of your gift-giving plans!

name: Kayla Sprayberry
text: I dropped my engagement ring off on Saturday to get resized and got it back Monday evening it looks amazing. Great price would definitely recommend ware jewelers to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kayla!  We're always happy to help.

name: Darlene Smith
text: I love shopping at Ware's! The customer service is excellent and I can trust their expertise to help me pick the perfect gift for those special occasions!

resp.text: Thank you, Darlene!  We're always happy to help.

name: T. P.
text: Ben was so very helpful, I never felt rushed and he was extremely knowledgeable and professional. I would highly recommend Ware Jewelers for your next purchase.

resp.text: Thank you, Tonja!  We've counted ourselves very lucky to have Ben as part of the Ware family, his concern for his clients really is second to none.

name: Angie Kelsoe
text: Beautiful downtown Auburn Store, knowledgeable and friendly staff. Jennifer Chastain was such a tremendous help with our experience at Ware!

name: Philipe Aldahir
text: While i was shopping for an engagement ring, not only they didn't think my business was not important enough, but they didnt get back to me on the matter. I was promised they'd bring in more stones for me to look at, and even after i emailed the person who "helped" me, i go no answer. Not a very smart way to do things. I'll never be buying anything from them for the rest of my life. And will strongly advice against it.

name: Anna Hovey
text: Betsi is a true gem to work with!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Anna!  I like that; a gem in a jewelry store!

name: Jamie Ware
text: Great service!

resp.text: Thank you, Jamie!

name: Arnold Linda Pattillo
text: Love Wares

resp.text: Thank you, Arnold!

name: Cristi Smith
text: I know that their prices can be a little on the up side so I usually don't stop to buy I just browse. I had been looking for a place to get my 4 month olds ears pierced, and they do it! It has been extremely hard to find anyone because of "COVID". They were very professional, and the lady took great care of us! I have already recommended them!

name: Dan Quixote
text: Went to get my daughters ears pierced the Friday before last. The woman who claimed to be the manager was rude and acted like she had something better to do than to talk to my wife and I, and what ultimately deterred me from the transaction was the fact she was wearing a tank top. I wouldn’t want her arm pits in my face, so I spared my child that experience. We went to Claire’s and had a great experience with a well dress, kind mannered woman who made my child feel at ease.

name: janell johnson
text: Do not go to this place if you are piercing your yound child's ears. I just left from trying to get my 3 year old daughters ears pierced. She was excited and we let her pick her own earrings out. A nice lady helped us but you could tell she was new and learning. She kept having to ask questions to her supervisors who acted like they were too busy to help her, which ultimately took way longer than what it should have taken to complete the transaction, about 45 mins before we were finally asked to come sit in the chair. By that time my daughter was becoming impatient  and started to get nervous. We went to sit in the chair and she started to freak out. The employees just starred at her. They werent nicely trying to tell her that it would be quick or that it would be okay. They just starred. Previously my husband asked if we could pay after the piercing had been done because we werent sure if our daughter would go through with it. We were told no we had to pay immediately. After a minute of trying to get my daughter to cooperate I asked if we could get a refund. We were told no, they do not do refunds. I asked if we could come back another day after she had time to calm down, again we were told no. HORRIBLE, INCONSIDERATE CUSTOMER SERVICE. We took the earrings we paid for and left.

resp.text: Janell, we are so sorry to hear about this experience and will follow up with our team to address what you've stated here. Thank you for being so open about your visit.

name: Kijuana Smith
text: Love this place..customer service is kind of low depending on who's working

resp.text: Thank you, Kijuana! We are always striving for excellence so your feedback is appreciated!

name: Jennifer Farris
text: The manger at store 1205 is rude, doesn’t follow company rules about always making the costumer happy... said she knew about me and she knows nothing.. she does not even know how to run the store... this use to be my favorite store to go to but, I will never use this store again.. I will tell everyone about her and the incompetent of this store ppl sleeping on the floor when they are supposed to be working. No management

name: Annie Mcghee
text: They automatically add a protection  plan with jewelry purchase without asking if you want it and that upset me very much

name: Donna Reid
text: Did a great job piercing my 13 month old granddaughter's ears. Thank you

name: Abigail Davenport
text: Use to be a great place. Truly has gone downhill.

name: Jennifer DeRousse
text: Great service Samantha is wonderful

name: Dacia Jones
text: They put the wrong sized earrings in my ears tht caused swelling to both of my ears and the customer service wasn't so great

name: Debra Whitehead
text: Horrible store. Horrible staff. Go to Claire’s.

name: Dane Martin
text: Isbell  reset my wife’s wedding ring adding diamonds to the original diamond.  They did a beautiful job that transformed her ring and she’s totally happy with it’s dazzling new look.  Great craftsmanship and customer service.  Looking forward to using them again!

name: Beth Hawley
text: I love Isbell Jewelers! They will work with you and design pieces for you that fit your look and budget. My son was married last year and was so proud of the gorgeous engagement/wedding ring set they helped him choose—my daughter in law gets so many compliments!

name: Janet Sanders
text: Best jewelry store I have ever been in. Staff is incredible always willing to go out of their way to make the customer happy ...I have had many pieces from rings, earrings, necklaces and bracelets custom  made and have always been very happy. I have sent family and friends and they all have been extremely satisfied. You can't go wrong with Isbells

name: Joseph Wolf
text: Knowledgeable and helpful

name: Teamschmidt3
text: Isbell's designed an engagement setting for us for an asscher cut stone that other well-known jewelers seemed to have a difficult time assisting us with. They did a great job helping us find a setting to perfectly compliment it and later made a matching eternity band. They have the most amazing jewelry, especially their custom pieces, for a great price. They are the kindest people and you will not find individuals who are more knowledgeable and talented anywhere around. I get compliments weekly and it's been a few years since my engagement setting was done; that says something in my book. If you have something "custom" in mind or a love for "vintage" and one-of-a-kind pieces, this is your place! :)

name: Jack Mills
text:
I appreciate the excellent service that Mr. and Mrs. Isbell provides.
I would love to recommend this store to anyone.

name: Sonya Teston
text: Gorgeous jewelry and super friendly customer service. Recommend getting jewelry from here for that special someone

name: Eric Kamber
text: Excellent work!! Mr Wilson does a great job and is fun to talk to as well!  Highly recommend.

name: Vincent Williams
text: Convenient and customer-friendly, customer-focused...

name: Kimberly Bearden
text: Always happy to go the extra mile. ❤️❤️

name: Nicole T. Springer
text: I was blown away by the customer service at Hudson-Poole. We came in to look at engagement rings on a Saturday about 30 minutes from closing, and the staff were incredible. I told them what I liked and my budget and they were able to help us find ones that fit what we wanted. The store is immaculate, and you can tell they truly want each customer to have a great and personalized experience. They were never pushy or looking to push us past our price point at all. Incredibly patient and just a fantastic experience all around. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: WOW!!! Thank you so much, Nicole. It means so much to us that you took the time to share this. Please come back by to see us whenever you are close. We wish you both many blessings! Sincerely, John Poole

name: Andy Love
text:
The reviews here don’t lie.. excellent customer services! My name is Holly . I have visited the store to redesign a band for my diamond ring that I’ve had for a long time but not liking the style too much.
They drawer up a beautiful fancy computer graphics design of the ring base on details I want with measurements of all angle... and even provided me a wax version of the band to try on.. and everything is free of charge.. isn’t that Amazing 💕
But I later have decided of not to go with it because my sister like the original ring and wanted to purchase the ring from me..
I felt bad to have them working so hard for me for nothing so I also purchased a beautiful pair of diamonds and citrine earring before I left the store just to thank you for their service ❤️
Love them ❤️The best in town

resp.text: Holly, you are so sweet to take the time to write this incredible review!!! We love making custom pieces with family stones. That is what makes jewelry so special, the ones that can tell the story of the family and their journey. I am so glad that your sister will be enjoying that ring. Please let us know if we can help in the future. We wish you many blessings!!

name: William Curry
text: John and his staff are exceptional. The customer service at Hudson and Poole is great. When you walk in they greet you with a smile. Ten years ago, I purchased my wife’s engagement ring here because of their wonderful reputation. With help from Krista, I got the perfect ring (All of the 4Cs) for my wife. Thanks a million.

name: Benjamin Brown
text: Very helpful and friendly staff, but the appraiser is incompetent. Don't waste your money getting your jewelry appraised here.

name: Honor Able
text: I went there a year ago to get my sons name engraved on his necklace. They were very welcoming from the moment you walk in to the moment you walk out

name: Jamie lou Purser
text: Very elegant store and friendly stafr

name: Shane Gardner
text: Awesome jewelry and great service and the best book/do it all keeper ever 👍

name: Holly Ha†cher
text: Super helpful people! Always beautiful jewelry!

resp.text: Holly, thank you so much for your kind words about our wonderful staff. We sincerely appreciate you for the time you took to give us this review!

name: Jeffrey (Jeff) Muratori
text: Great service with a friendly environment! Will definitely be going back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review, Jeffrey!

name: Ashley “Kav” Kavanagh
text: Incredibly helpful staff! They appraised and cleaned my antique and new jewelry and were very intrigued by a few pieces discussing with me all the details they could tell me. Definitely will be returning for future cleanings and hopefully purchases as well!

resp.text: Ashley, we thank you so much for taking the time to give us this great review and for the five stars! Come by anytime and have a great day.

name: James Waltman
text: Wonderful collection of jewelry and other great gift ideas. The staff is knowledgeable and attentive. Hudson-Poole Fine Jewelers is the ONLY place i shop for my fine jewelry needs.

name: Junea Childers
text: Traveled 108 miles getting there. Called before I went. Told them I was bringing a 1954 Gibson Mandolin. However when I got there. I was being checked in by a nice counter clerk, when all of the sudden a young man came out and abruptly rushed me out saying "there was no market for instruments". When in their TV ad they had promoted a variety of items they were accepting. Instruments included.

resp.text:
Junea,
I am so sorry that you took your time to come to our store and not get a good answer. This is the first time we have partnered with a buying group that does the variety that they do. I wish the young man had asked me or my father who in town deals in fine instruments. I have a wonderful referral for you, as we have already called one of the owners that would very much like to make an offer on your mandolin. Please contact Dan at the Guitar Gallery. Here is their website:
https://theguitargallery.com

We really hope that this works out, and we will  always be here to help in any of your jewelry needs if you can give us another chance.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice-President

name: Luke Remmert
text: Simply the best jeweler in town. No need to go anywhere else.

resp.text: We really appreciate you giving us such a wonderful review, Luke!

name: Andrew Durham
text: I’m not sure where to start to explain how happy and satisifed I am with Hudson Poole. I walked in and met Heather, and from the second I met her I felt so comfortable and like I knew her. Mrs. Jamie Poole shortly also assisted me. Mrs. Poole was absolutely wonderful. She respected my opinions, she walked me through a step in life that I am new to. Hudson Poole has my business for life. Generally, going into a fine jewelry store is a very overwhelming experience as generally the staff doesn’t open up and welcome. These folks made me feel like family. Thank you Hudson Poole for being so amazing!

resp.text: Jake, thank you so much for this incredible review!! We are extremely proud and humbled that you have chosen us to be your family jeweler, and we work very hard to keep your trust.

name: Happy Lady
text: First I would like to say thank John for doing a fantastic job with my ring. John went above and beyond to work with me. Everyone at Hudson Poole always makes me feel welcome. I will use Hudson Poole forever. The way I can custom do jewelry makes me so excited!

resp.text: WOW! This is an amazing review! Thank you so much!!

name: caroline staggers
text: Always very friendly, professional and helpful. Beautiful selection of jewelry and gifts. Do great repair work.

resp.text: Caroline, Thank you very much for this great review. We really appreciate you coming by to see us!

name: Peony
text: I spent a long time searching for a strong but delicate-looking die-struck (not cast) setting for the stones from my old broken down three-stone ring. Krista and staff helped me find the perfect setting. I drove hours to Tuscaloosa and back several times (past plenty of other jewelry stores) to get the prettiest ring and best customer service. Everyone at Hudson-Poole is responsive and so helpful--in person, by phone, text and email. The long trip was absolutely worth it!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for giving us this wonderful review! We appreciate you trusting us to reset your three stone ring. Please come by anytime for us to clean and check it.

name: Jeremey Newell
text: I had a very special wedding band sized down. I took it home and noticed it didn’t fit as well as I thought. This was a mistake that I personally made. It had nothing to do with the quality of work that Hudson-Poole provides. I went back to Hudson-Poole and asked them to resize again. Not only did they resize, but they did it at no additional costs. They said my satisfaction was their goal. Excellent customer care. They will definitely handle all of my fine jewelry business in the future.

name: Emily DeFrance
text: Their jewelry is exquisite and there are so many beautiful choices. The customer service is excellent and you feel like family when you are there.

resp.text: Emily, thank you for coming to see us and for the excellent review. We will work hard to make sure it stays this way and for anyone you send to us. I am so sorry for the late "thank you". Have a wonderful 4th of July!

name: Vivian Tant
text: Gene and his staff are phenomenal. You immediately feel at home when you walk through the door. Gene and John both did a fantastic job of helping me pick out my wedding band and my future husbands wedding band. They talked me through the whole process, and I left feeling like I knew exactly what I was getting and how important I was to their company. I will forever send anyone looking for jewelry to them! Thankful for such a wonderful company in our community!

resp.text: Vivian, thank you so much for this phenomenal review! We appreciate you letting us be the ones to help you with your wedding bands and we will continue to work hard to keep that trust to be your family jeweler.

name: George Jacob Houghtaling
text: The BEST jewelry store in Alabama!  The BEST customer service in Alabama!  The BEST prices in Alabama!  You get the idea?  I have been doing business here over 12 years and never have been disappointed.  Gene, Jamie, John, Krista and their outstanding staff are true professionals.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this awesome review, George!!

name: Leanne Phillips Mays
text: I just purchased my garnet and diamond "Roll Tide" ring from out of state. I originally saw this ring on Pinterest several years ago, and have spent many nights stressing that they would discontinue it before I could buy it. Ashley took care of me with the most professional and caring manner. My ring arrived today, and it is worth every penny. Thank you for helping my dream piece of jewelry become a reality.

name: Susie Palmer
text:
Always very friendly staff.  Always.
I brought a box-chain necklace back, which I had bought from there.  It broke as I was cleaning it.
They repaired it on my visit and I walked out with it.
Not too mention, they also helped me a with watch band adjustment (not bought from them). Noncharge.  Simply a complimentary service.
That's why I will wait, until a trip back to Alabama from Oklahoma, just to go by Hidson-Poole.  They always treat me well.
Thank you!  :)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susie. I cannot thank you enough for taking the time to give us this great review. We hope to see you the next time you are back in Tuscaloosa.

name: Kathleen Stein
text: They did a great job fixing my bracelet. Their price for the repair was very affordable and the customer service was great!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you very much, Kathleen!

name: Christien Hawthorne
text: I am absolutely in LOVE with my ring! I ordered it online and the next day received a call from John Poole who is the Vice President of the company. He told me that unfortunately the ring was out of stock but that he had already contacted the designer in New York to have them build a new one which would only take about two weeks. Sure enough, I later received another call from Mr. Poole notifying me that my ring was ready and that he would set up email alerts for the shipping so I could track the package. It arrived in a cute little wrapped box with a big bow and had a business card that was personally signed. Loved the personal touch. Awesome experience -- will definitely recommend to others!

name: HRH METALS
text: Very nice people/helpful/nice large place/probably have what you need or want

name: Barbara Nicosia
text: I left 2 pairs of earrings to be fixed.  When they called & gave me the price, I said just fix one, the other one’s too expensive for its worth.  When I picked them up, Mr. Poole told me they had fixed both of them, & he wasn’t going to charge me for the 2nd pair since it was their mistake.  So nice to find honest, reputable merchants still around!

resp.text: We really appreciate the five star rating and for this wonderful review, Barbara! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.

name: Sammy Gray
text: Exceptional service! Very courteous, and everyone went out of their way to help with all our needs. As a first time customer, I've definately found my new primary jeweler for future purchases!

name: Brittany Graham
text:
Hudson-Poole is a fantastic Place to purchase jewelry. Not only do they have an outstanding selection of merchandise that is all very different and can suit anyone’s taste, their customer service is out of this world. I will continue to shop from them, even though I am not a local, because of those two things.

They care about their customers, they have a fantastic selection, and you can tell that they care about you as a person and not just getting business from you. That, to me,  is everything. You can’t go wrong with this place! :-)

name: Kristy H
text: Big thanks to John for taking such great care of all my needs and wants. I highly recommend this company if you are looking for your next piece of jewelry! Thanks again for being so kind and taking care of me.

resp.text: Thank you so much for giving us another chance and for this wonderful review!

name: Hannah George
text: A great jewelry shop with unique merchandise good for anyone's taste! Also, incredible customer service. The workers will spend time with you to suit your needs. When my ring I had bought a month ago began to lose color, Hudson-Poole replaced it without any charge. I cannot speak highly enough on how wonderful this place is!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review, Hannah! We thank you for coming back to see us to let us get it right.

name: Julia Clark
text: Hudson Poole is full of some of the kindest staff members. I truly feel the people here look out for their customers best interests. A big thank you to John Poole for helping me get the necklace of my dreams in the metal color that I preferred. It's even better than I had envisioned and I cannot thank you enough.

resp.text: We are blown away by your wonderful review, Julia. Thank you so much for your time and thought that you put into it!

name: Camille Robinson
text:
Very few jewelers have all the qualities I need in meeting my expectations for superior quality merchandise, customer service and custom pieces.  Hudson-Poole Fine Jewelers makes my “A List”.
I have purchased and had custom pieces made by Hudson-Poole for many years.  In fact, I am working with John Poole now on a new custom ring.  If you are looking for a professional jeweler, visit Hudson-Poole in Tuscaloosa,Alabama.

Camille Ogden Robinson

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great review, Camille!

name: joseph ushe
text: First class, actual people who want to Help you and make sure you are happy! I will be back again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this great review, Joseph!

name: Natalia Go
text: If I could give a 10 star out of 5, I would! Hudson-Poole saved my wedding day! This is probably the best jewelry store I every walked into. My fiancee and I don't have a big budget for our wedding and we needed something that we could afford. Ashley was there with us every step of the way, making sure that we get the rings we want and that we stay on budget. She is a hero! Plus, they offer services for maintenance and repairs, some for free. I definitely love Hudson-Poole <3 This will be the first place I would go to for any piece of jewelry.

resp.text:
Natalia,
I read your review and was blown away! Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great testimonial. I spoke with Ashley and Tanner and we all truly appreciate you both thinking of us for your wedding rings.  We will do all we can to continue to be your family jeweler. The next time you are by the store I would really like to thank you in person, so please ask for me when you do. I wish you many blessings and Godspeed in all of your hopes and dreams together.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice President

name: Connie Harris
text: The girls that helped me were very kind and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Connie, for this five star review!

name: Kaitie Brihn
text: Everyone was very nice and helpful!

resp.text: Katie, thank you so much for stopping by and for this great review!

name: Patterson "Patt" Howard
text: Such a lovely buying experience at Hudson-Poole today. I felt well advised, knowledgeable staff and a very fair price on a lovely set of pearls for our mother. We will shop again with this store.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your kind words, Patt. We hope that we can continue to go above and beyond on our service to remain your family jeweler.

name: Marsha McAllister
text: I would give Hudson Poole more than 5 stars if I could. All the employees are nice and knowledgeable. And the customer service is great. Repairs are timely.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! Also,  thank you for thinking of us for your jewelry repair needs.

name: Kayla Fleischer
text: Absolutely stunning! The staff was more than courteous and delightful! They take the time to answer all your questions and really help you find that right piece. In love!

resp.text: Kayla, thank you so much for taking the time to give us this fantastic review! We truly appreciate it. Let us know if there is anything we can do for you.

name: Vicki Baggett
text: I love supporting local family owned businesses and Hudson Poole Fine Jewelers makes this so easy for me. They always treat me like family and go above and beyond to meet my needs. Whether I'm needing a gift, making a big purchase, or only getting a repair done they are always so eager to assist me any way they can.

name: Andrew Todd
text: I came in to have an additional appraisal performed for an engagement ring that I purchased for my girlfriend. They looked at the stone recommended revising the language of the existing appraisal rather than having a second appraisal performed. They extended the highest-quality service to me, even though the recommendation resulted in me not making a purchase today. I will use them for all my jewelry needs in Tuscaloosa!

name: Caroline Shines
text: This is my number 1 place everything is beautiful

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review, Caroline! You make our day every time we see you!

name: Heather Reeves
text: Rachel is one of the sweetest, genuine people to assist people with jewelry purchases.  Ale is very honest and informed. Her trustworthiness is impressive which will always bring customers back.

name: Willie Aaron
text: I have been doing business with this company for several now and each time it has been a class act. Mr. and Mrs. Poole have been wonderful to deal with. Highly recommended!!

name: Alwyn Protheroe
text:
Yet another shot of excellent service ! ! !
Having dealt with Hudson Pool for several, several years, with John in particular, I can say that not one time have I had ANY cause to complain about the service I have had, they are people who will go out of their way to help you.

resp.text: Alwyn, thank you so much for writing such a fantastic review for our store. We thank you for always thinking of us!

name: Angelique Dean
text: The staff at Hudson-Poole are always so helpful and kind! I get the best service from them whether I'm purchasing jewelry or just getting my ring cleaned!

name: Robert Bulson
text: First class place of business. Very friendly and helpful employees.

resp.text: We are very thankful that you have been shopping with us. Thank you so much for the fantastic review!

name: Rachel Willis
text: Very helpful and friendly employees! Coming to Hudson-Poole is always a pleasant experience!

resp.text: Thank you for this great review, Rachel. We really appreciate you coming to see us!

name: Dana Micael
text: This is the place to go if you need jewelry or any help with current pieces! The staff is incredibly kind and are always welcoming to my husband and I. John Poole is the best at what he does!

resp.text: I cannot thank you enough for this fantastic review, Dana. Thank you both so much for your trust. This made my day! Sincerely, John Poole

name: Tristen Larson
text: Very kind and helpful employees! Went in to get my glasses repaired, they were very efficient.

name: Nikki Little
text: Very helpful picking out my finances wedding band! Thank you Tanner for your time and friendly service!

text: We (JT & Leanne) have been customers for several years and Josh @ Dylan Rings has always done a great job with custom designing the perfect ring! We originally had him do a complete makeover of Leanne's original ring a few years ago, and then recently upgraded the center stone and it turned out fabulous!  Josh made sure the diamond was exactly what we wanted, provided all the necessary certifications and appraisal paperwork, and is a true professional!  If you're looking for something that is unique to YOU and designed with your ideas and pricing in mind, you need to visit Josh @ Dylan Rings!  Thank you sir - we are very happy!

resp.text: Thank you for continuing to trust me to serve your jewelry needs,  it is my pleasure!

name: Amy Hibbs
text:
Josh has created 2 custom rings for me. The first was my wedding band and I love it. The second was a huge undertaking. I lost my 3 year old son in a drowning accident, 12 years ago. I had a diamond given to me at his birth and wanted a ring made with it. He would have turned 16 this year and I wanted to remember him with a Sweet 16 Ring as his mama. We worked together to create a one of a kind antique style ring with several of my diamonds and sapphires i purchased from Josh for my son’s birthstone.
He showed me computer generated pictures of what it would look like, but it did not even compare to the final product. This ring is an artist’s masterpiece!! Josh is such a talented artist and he truly exceeded my greatest expectations for this ring! It means the world to me!
If you need a custom made ring or any jewelry whatsoever, do not look anywhere else. Josh is extremely knowledgeable and easy to work with. He will meet every single dream you have for the jewelry you want! I’ll never go anywhere else!

resp.text: We are so very honored to have played a part in your story,  and am grateful that you enjoy the ring so much.  Thank you!

text: I needed to get some jewelry appraised and all of the jewelers in Auburn told me that they would need to keep the jewelry and ship it out for appraisal and then return it to me. This led me to Davis Fine Jewelers. They were able to not only provide me an appraisal but also took my concerns into consideration and gathered the information they needed from the jewelry while I waited. If you are looking for a professional appraisal experience where you will be treated with respect and leave satisfied. I cannot recommend Davis Jewelers enough.

He went to Davis fine Jewelers and not only did he repair it, the repair was quick and he only charged him including tax 25.00.. text: Great prices great staff

name: Kit Jones
text:
First,  this is a Christian-based fine jewelry establishment! For those of you who are serious about an engagement and marriage ...this is definitely the place to serve you and your family! First my fiancé (now my husband) and I were living in Washington, DC when we saw a piece that Mr. Davis created! I loved the lady's ring some much that I had to know where she purchased the ring. She referred us to Mr. Davis at Davis Fine Jewelry. We flew down to visit with him about 6 months before the wedding. He was very direct and straight forward about cost, delivery time and steps that would be included in fruition to the finished product. He was true to his word. From the moment he finished casting the mold for my unique one-of-a kind ring, he called to allow me to see the size, demensions and make sure I was comfortable and satisfied with the direction the project was going. Even in the middle of the business's move from the location near Eastdale to the new location now closer to the Montgomery Mall area, he kept me abreast of each step. By the time I saw my ring, even without the stones set, I was estatic! Mr. Davis IS a "Master Jeweler"! He will even pray over your ring and marriage! I was equally excited to have Mr. Davis create my ring; since my grandparents met at Maxwell Airforce Base in Montgomery, Alabama.

I feel blessed to have such a unique, gifted and spiritual man create my exquisite and beautiful wedding ring ..... that has more substantive meaning for me. I pray it will be passed down from generation to generation!

Feeling Blessed,
Kit

name: Tabatha Walker
text: I purchased over $100 dollars in watch batteries with lifetime warrenties.I Recently retured to have the batteries replaced and hours later one of the watches stopped working. I went back to replace the battery once again and was told that the battery has been tested and was fine and that they DO NOT do watch repairs. The employee was very impolite and didm't seem interested in anything but giving me my merchadise. I wasn't surprised because on my first visit there the owner himself made several comments about a body piercing I have that was irrelevant to my visit.

They sold me a white gold plated ring as true white gold,  one of the stones is loose and they were over a week behind in the repair I needed done. Also, the customer service was cordial, but returning calls and giving accurate information is apparently not their specialty. I do not recommend.

text: I've had many pieces of jewelry from Wilson's. Necklaces, rings, bracelets, earrings & watches. I get so many wonderful comments on my engagement ring and wedding band! Customer service is always great. We were very undecisive when it came to my rings but they helped us find something that was original yet classic and we couldn't be happier. I have several friends and family members that use them as well and have never had a bad experience. Highly recommend them.

text: The staff is friendly and very helpful. just tell them what your looking for and they will go out of their to make sure your satisfied

name: Joe M
text: I bought my wife's engagement ring from Wilson Jewelers about 7 years ago and at that time I recieved excellent service.  Just recently one of the diamonds in the ring fell out and I told her to use Wilson's to get it fixed because of my previous experience with them. What a mistake... She has been trying to get a simple estimate to submit to the insurance company for two weeks. Each time we call to inquire about it we recieve the same old story... They will leave a message for Rebbeca (who they tell me is the owner) and have her call me back. We have left "three" messages and no one has ever returned our call to update us on the situation. This morning I called again to check on the status and asked to talk to the owner or manager. The lady I was talking with immediately got defensive and rude, and asked me where I was calling from... I asked her for her name and she tired to avoid it by asking me my name, even though I had already given it to her.  I'm in the military and have been to a lot of different jewelers, and this is by far the worst service that I have recieved. I was going out of my way to give my business to them, what a mistake. I will never attempt to use this jeweler again and hopefully you don't make the same mistake. Thanks for reading.

name: 1968kenpoman
text: Drop off pendent to be repaired it's been two weeks still not repaired and it's not in store for me to get it back, last time I had this same pendant repaired it took 1 hour and cost 22 dollars, Wilson's wants 40 dollars and I still have no fixed pendent in hand ,this is unacceptable business practice.

This business tried to offer me $100.00 for two rings an emgagement ring and a weddin
g band...total rip off business

text: Wanted to go with a local business to have my rings put together and this place came up on my search. Best choice I made. The Owner and his (Great Great Great Great grandson-J/k) were a pleasure to do business with and the work on my rings was fantastic. Definitely use them for all your jewelry needs (The work was done under Lider)

name: K
text: First of all, we have used this place for years. I went in for a new battery for my husband's Movado watch. I inquired about a piece being welded back on a gold hoop earring that I had brought in on a Saturday back before the pandemic. The owner was not there but a young man was with an unkempt appearance. He quoted me $45. I told him that was more than I paid for them so I guess I would just sell them for scrap. So currently while in the jewelry shop, I inquired with the owner who informed me they have a $30/minimum. I was not told of that the 1st time I inquired. The owner began chatting saying, "You know, I went to the dealership the other day, they told me my tire was going to be $150, I told them, no, it should be $10." Then he said, "I went to the grocery store, they said my groceries were $100, I told them, no, it should be $10." While putting the battery in the watch, he stated, "You know this watch has the wrong size battery?" "The battery is too big." I informed him it was purchased at a pawn shop so I have no clue who put the battery in but it worked for a long time. He said, "Well, that's what you get buying from a pawn shop," in a condescending tone. I never requested a lower price on the earring repair. I will not pay for something only to be spoken to in this manner. His level of sarcasm was ridiculous. I will not be a patron of his business any longer nor will I ever refer anyone to him again.

resp.text:
Hello, glad you have been using us for many years. Sorry you had a bad experience this time around. Hope the battery that we put into your watch stays working longer than the one you got from the pawn shop. As for your earring. You came in the store without it and you did want a price on how much it would cost to fix it. But we can not give a price on any item unless we actually see it. You said you talked with me before the pandemic and I told you it would cost 45 dollars apparently. And like you said in your comment "that was more than I paid for them".
We don't do any repairs on earrings for free and we do have a minimum price we charge on basic repairs like those. I know you wanted a cheaper price because you complained to the owner about it. That is why he gave you examples of other scenarios like the ones you posted in your comment. Hes by no means trying to upset you or offend you in anyway. He just wanted you to understand that we don't barter with prices and we can't just give you a price without seeing the item. The owner also is very honest and upfront with any problems with repairs. That is also why he was concerned and wanted to let you know your watch already had the wrong battery put in it. As for me, I am the young man replying to your review and I do reply to all reviews that concern me. I do believe calling me unkempt was rude and uncalled for especially since I never said anything bad at all to you and barely talked with you in our store. Sorry my appearance is not up to your standards. As always have a nice day and I hope you have a wonderful Easter.

name: Emily Hanson
text: I love them. They are quick and great prices. Best place to have stuff done. They listen and achieve what you want. Always impressed with their work. I wont use no one else. Very friendly people too.

name: Fran Banks
text: I just want to say, I googled jewelry repairs and this store came up as one of the ten best jewelry stores in Mobile. I must say that this store did live up to the google search statement. The owner and his grandson were very nice, courteous, friendly and professional. The ring repair was amazing, fast  and the price was very reasonable. I would recommend this store if you have any repairs. I definitely will be going back for any of my jewelry needs and repairs. Please do not hesitate to take your business to this store because they truly are one of the best jewelry store in Mobile Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We really appreciate it and your business. Come back anytime Fran. It's also nice to know you think I'm so young by calling me the owners grandson. But I'm actually his son and I'm 30 years old. Again thank you Fran and see you next time.

name: Lovie Williams
text: Great experience each and every time I come in. Friendly staff and very professional. I recommend this shop any day. Best in town hands down

name: Allyn Stepp
text: Jim and his son have always provided excellent customer service and advise on all jewelry purchases and repairs I have had with them. I have been using them for about seven or eight years and have never been dissatisfied. They did a custom build for my fiancé‘s engagement ring that is absolutely beautiful! She gets compliments on it all the time. Best jewelers I have ever dealt with. I would recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you Ms Allyn, it was nice seeing you again and we hope your having a great New Year.

name: Ericka Goodwin
text:
Custom Fast-Fix Jewelry Repair did a great job sizing my ring.  The guys are very helpful and take their time to ensure you get the right fit to accommodate your finger.  I was very pleased with the outcome of the ring being sized.  They sized the ring down. The guys were finished with the ring and it was ready for me to pick it up in less than two hours. It cost me $55.00. Considering this was same day service,  taking less than two hours and AMAZING costumer service,  I consider the charge to be very reasonable. I can't stress how helpful these guys are when helping you.
I will definitely return and as of my first experience today, I  have become a costumer for life.
Please don't let the other negative reviews prevent you from giving this business a chance. I read the reviews from others before going to this business. I went ahead and gave them a chance despite the negative reviews from others. The good reviews out weighed the bad reviews. I understand that each individual may have varying experiences when dealing with your jewelry. With that being said,  I quickly determined today that this business is costumer oriented and cares for their costumers satisfaction. I can't imagine if someone does have a problem with their work,  these guys would be more than willing to make it right. That's the impression I got today from them. They have very strong work ethic,  take pride in their work,  and are very knowledgeable.
Oh,  one more thing.... today when we were trying to determine the right size for my ring because this ring was a gift from my husband and is an addition to my wedding set, the guys examined the size of my wedding ring which is now the middle ring in my set. He discovered that my band was a little bent. He asked if I would like him to straighten it. He straightened it,  no charge! That's a real,  professional,  costumer oriented jeweler!

name: Tsuki Dusk
text: I've gotten a little work done here. It's a family owned store and the staff has always been very courteous to me and given great advice. The older man is very blunt/honest about things so I can see how people would take offense but he's only ever been helpful to me. They replaced my watch battery which wasn't a normal sized battery, sized and polished my ring, and welded my broken necklace. They suggested I buy a new chain since it was just a simple Walmart one and more likely to break again. They also advised me not to wear it to sleep or in the shower like I have been. I've never had a decent chain for my necklace and the pendant was a gift from my significant other so I broke down and bought a box chain. I don't regret it at all. This new chain has lasted me over 6 months. As far as the work I've had done, it was all done within a few minutes (battery) to hours (ring size). The prices are reasonable for the work you get done. I'll add pictures later if I get the chance

name: Tyra Martin
text: Went into store several months ago, as referred by one of the jewelry stores in the mall.  First encounter, nice and seemed genuine.  He looked at my ring and advised the prongs on each side needed to be replaced and it would be $75/side, totaling $150!  He "placed" my diamond in but said, it was just sitting in there and if I was to wear it, it would come out.  I FINALLY get my $150 together and go in last week, only to be told, the prongs around my center diamond needed to be replaced and that was $300 off the top....I was BLOWN away, to say the least.  He goes on to say, each side had to be completely re-done and THAT would be $150/side, totaling $300!!  I advised him he NEVER said that and he responded, with a smile, "Well, you can look at it and tell it needs new prongs on the top".  I said, well, I can't, I'm not a jeweler, with a smile!  I advised him I wasn't prepared to pay $600 for a job that was quoted $150. He just responded, well, that's what it gonna take to have it right...oh, the diamond is loose, I can't tell"!  He gave me a card(which I tore up and trashed) with his "new" quote!  Can you say SCAM ARTIST!!  I'm making sure I tell EVERYONE, not to patron him.  I REALLY felt like he "uped" the price thinking I received a BIG tax refund. He'll be out of business soon!!!! :(

resp.text: Were sorry you misunderstood the qoute and the price it was to replace or repair your ring. We have set prices. We do not alter or change them just because a customer wants it changed. It is pretty pointless to post a review when you never got any work done. And just want to complain about a price. If you had actually got work done Id love to see a receipt because we would want to fix the issue at no cost.

name: Robert Garner
text: I had two watches to repair and they fixed both in a timely manner. Polite and courteous. Thanks for the great help! You are now my one stop shop for watch and jewelry repair

resp.text: Thank you Robert for doing business with us, we really appreciate it. We would be more than happy to help you out with future repairs anytime. We hope you have a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

name: Paul Lujan
text: The young man behind the counter was very helpful in helping me makes decision on a Christmas gift for my daughter. He explained the difference in the types of diamonds and the types of clarity. I would recommend this store to anyone looking for jewelry!

name: Noah Hughes
text: The staff were very courteous and professional in their dealing with customers.  They did an outstanding job on downsizing my wife ring. I was very impressed with this business and how quickly they were able to complete the work. Thanks.

resp.text: Thank you Noah, we really appreciate you and your wifes business. If you guys ever need anything done in the future come on back anytime. Hope you and your wife have a wonderful New Years.

name: Damon Davis
text: One of the most professional experience I've ever had at a jeweler. The owner and staff were outstanding and polite also knowledgeable. If you haven't patroned this business yet you really should very reasonable priced work and fast great quality of work. Thanks again and continue the great work.

name: Patrick Bosarge
text: My wife went in the store on 12/16/17 to get a ring sized. She said he was nice. BUT when she went back to get the ring the accents (rose gold coloring)was gone from one side of ring guy told her to take it back where she bought it and if she got a new one he would size it for free so I went to take the other ring back to have it sized today 12/19/17 and the guy was rude. His attitude was towards me  was not good. He made me fill as if he was surprised we came back with another ring. It made me feel as if he did not want to do what he told my wife he would. We dropped the ring off to him about 10 o'clock in the morning. We called him after 2 o'clock to see if it was ready. He said he would call when it was done. We never got a call so we went up to his store around 4:30 and he was just as rude when we picked up the ring like he did not even won't us in his store. Would not recommend this place to anyone.

resp.text: This is the co owner and I was actually the one who took in your wifes ring. I did mention to her sizing / cleaning the ring would be at her risk since it did have rose gold plated on each side. The ring was almost as if someone took a paint brush and painted it barely with rose gold on the sides. However a little bit of the rose gold plating did come off while cleaning it. We were sorry about that and we did tell her if she did get another ring we would size it for free. And she did come back into the store today with you and I actually handled the conversation, and I by no means was rude so I'm sorry if you felt that I or the owner was rude in anyway. And I'm not shocked at all that you came back because we wanted to make things right. As far as getting your ring done and calling you. Christmas is a very busy time and we can't promise to get your repair done right away. And can't promise to call you when it is done. Thats why we tell customers it may take just an hour or two or longer and to just check back in with us. But we did want to ensure we got your repair done and you and your wife were happy with it before the day ended. And thats all that matters in the end. Sorry you felt like we did nothing to fix the problem and that you felt that we were rude and you recommend no one to visit our store. Hope you have wonderful Christmas and a Happy New Year with many many years to come!

name: joseph gagliardi
text:
I had the pleasure of speaking with the owner for over an hour. Not only was he extremely professional and honest, he had a warm smile as well. A perfect family business. When you need a professional touch, go see the best in the business. It was my pleasure to meet with you all.
Joe

name: Carla Saunee
text: We continue to be amazed by this establishment’s attention to detail and craftsmanship. The environment is friendly and inviting not to mention hospitable. Quality work in a short amount of time.

resp.text: Thank you Carla, hope you and your family have a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. Look forward to seeing you next year for any of your jewelry needs.

name: kennetra ellis
text: OMG...I LOVE THE FAST SERVICE..THE PRICE IS WORTH IT...U GET WAT U PAY FOR...😊

name: Mark Jackson
text: Always does a good job with my jewelry, watches. Fast service. Always gives good advice & what my options are for repairs. I feel I can trust him

name: Tony Harrison
text: I've used their service many years ago to replace a battery and resize the band in my $10,000 watch and they banged on it with a rubber hammer because they don't have the correct tools to push the pins out. I will never let them touch my watch again. My step dad took his watch that he got in Switzerland and he had them to replace the battery and now water moist gets into the watch has they broke the seals and did not replace them nor did they tell my step dad that until he took it back to them. But they did an excellent job fixing my wedding ring. They sized it down and polished it to look like new for $55.00 in a few hours.

resp.text: I'm sorry that happened to you. But we don't put a $10.20 battery in any $10,000 watch.  Also we don't recall doing any $10,000 dollar watch in the past few years. We normally tell customers to send it back to the company they got the watch from. Because we won't be responsible for a $10.20 battery in a $10,000 watch. Same goes for replacing the band on any $10,000. And when replacing battery's in watches we also check the gaskets or "seals" as you call them, If they are damaged. However if moisture happens in the watch. Your step dad must be going swimming with it  or taking showers with his water resistant watch. The only watch that can get wet is a waterproof watch. Waterproof means that your watch can be submerged completely underwater for long periods of time, and there won’t be one single drop of water that enters the interior.

name: Walter Combs
text:
I was recommended by a friend of mine. After extensive research I am happy to bring my business exclusively here.
Thank you Joe for the recommendation.

name: Steph Hyde
text: Excellent service, fixed my ring while I was on holiday, friendly staff, go out off there way to help. Will be using again and would recommend to everyone, due to the service and excellent repair and quality fix I recieved.

name: Ashley Horsley
text: Great experience with the same day service on my ring repair

name: Faye Ramskog
text: I have been a customer for years,and never been disappointed with service or work done. I feel like they are family! Never had to wait a week for repair,usually only hours!  If anyone needs jewelry repair,I most definitely reccommend CUSTOM FAST FIX!!

name: TBH Brotherhood
text: Brought in my ring to have it sized and wasn’t gonna make it back to pick until the following day, the gentleman was AWESOME and very understanding, so understanding he brought to me at my job, WILL BE RETURNING WITH MY OTHER JEWELRY

name: Maegan Lynch
text: Went to get my engagement ring sized and they had it done within an hour. I had waited months to get it sized because of the horror stories I had heard from friends about their rings being messed up once they got them back, plus it taking forever at other jewelers. I was extremely happy and they even cleaned it for me, so it looked brand new. Thank y’all so much!

resp.text: Im glad you had such a great experience. We aim to ensure all customers leave happy. Come back if you ever need something else done.

text: I have been using this business for years from ordering jewelry to jewelry repair. They have always been very courteous, knowlegeable, and reasonable. All services have been excellent.

resp.text: Thank you for always using us for your repair work Michele! We appreciate it very much. I hope you have a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year.

name: Angela Macon
text: Been using them for at least 10 years. Went in the other day, he didn't want to help me. He told me 80.00 on a tiny ring, that in the past he charged 45.00 to do. He just totally didn't want my business, and left there and went to Goldstein's and bought my necklace, that he so rudely would not help me look at. He missed that 400.00 sale!  As for his work, oh course it was good or I wouldn't have came back several times over the past years, or referred friends. Hate to say this, but I will most likely go back and pay the ridiculous price because I am so impatient and they have it done in an hour. Unless I can find someone else in the area, but I will never send another friend or family member in there to be treated like he treated me.

resp.text: I'm very happy you been using us for 10 years! And we always want to help our customers as much as we can. 80 dollars for a tiny ring must of been going up in size. We use to charge 45 dollars for a ring size depending on the ring. But that was probably 10 years ago. And our prices change over that period of time. And Im sorry we missed your sell.

name: Jack Hauff
text: Quick and easy. Well priced jewelry and watches. Repairs were done to my satisfaction. I'll be back.

My grandmother's ring looks like new.  I will be driving back again for all my jewelry repairs. Thanks a bunch.

name: Dale Shirley
text: Very professional and affordable. Highly recommend for repairs.

name: Mr. Bullard
text: This store has been nothing but helpful and has provided top notch quality and service. I've bought a few watches and had some custom jewelry created for my wife and I'd recommend this company to anyone!

name: Pat Ware
text: Needed a tiny "O" ring soldered to a tiny silver chain which cost about $6.00.  They wanted $20.00 to do it.   Outrageous!!   Probably would have been less at a quality jeweler.

resp.text: I'm sorry we did not meet the price you were looking for. We have a set price on all welds and O rings. Our prices will not be changed or altered.

name: Kristi Smith
text: Very friendly. Very nice work. Have used several times now.

name: Anamarie Finch
text: I would not recommend this place to ANYONE!! This place will rob you!!!!They will tell you a ridiculous price for repairs that you can get done elsewhere for half as much!!!!

resp.text: We are very sorry you seem to have had a bad experience with us. Can you please post a picture with your receipt and ticket number, with the name the item was under. And please explain what you got done here because we don't recall you ever even coming into our store. This just seems like a false review.

name: Olivia Harrison
text: Took less than 5 minutes to replace batteries.  Very friendly.

name: Anthony Jackson

Anthony in the future please do not leave a review for a business if you never had anything done and just want to loiter. Thank you.

name: Olivia Harrison

text: Called to get a price quote for two rings the guy that answered was very rude.I asked a question regarding the price and all he said was well thats our price..great way to push customers away..

resp.text: I'm sorry but we have a set price on repairs. And we don't give prices over the phone. If you are unhappy about the price we are sorry we can't lower it so please don't try to barter with us. Thank you :)

text: Horrible company!

name: Matthew Norman
text: $45 dollar ring size ready in an hour, very friendly.

name: Tammy Cucci
text: Very pleasant experience. Top notch A-1. We just went in to browse, we explained our budget to the sales person. She helped us pick out the perfect set of rings for me and we left with them that day. She really made the process fun, calm, and quick. I 100% recommend Diam Depot in Oxford, Alabama. So glad we chose this as our ring headquarters.

name: Fullers Offroad
text:
My experience began with Diamond Depot in 2017 when I chose my wife’s ring we have since stopped by the store many times. Last year we had to have her ring and bands removed due to pregnancy and damaged our rings in process! Diamond depot helped us create a whole new setting this year and it did not disappoint! Huge shout out to these guys for always coming through with the best service that we could ask for!
If you’re in the market these guys are here to help with many types of jewelry for your special someone!

name: Christina Clemons
text: In a time when so much is changing, it's good to know there are people that still value the authenticity and the importance of good service. I went in with an idea of purchasing a ring for my husband, but that was it ☺️ Lisa, the owner, really extended her expertise and listened to me describe my likes and his dislikes. She was very informative and just plain NICE and PATIENT WITH ME. I left feeling confident in my choice of purchase, but also feeling as though I was more than just another customer. Definitely will be referring others and will be doing more business with them.

name: Maya Crosby
text: I highly recommend Diamond Depot to anyone looking for jewelry. They are the kindest in the business and never pressure you to buy a thing. A great variety of jewelry and wonderful prices. We will never shop for jewelry anywhere else. I have gotten beautiful jewelry from them but the amazing customer service keeps me wanting to come back.

name: Hannah Donaldson
text: A five star review doesn’t even do Diamond Depot justice! Amanda, Lisa, and Terry are amazing people and I loved doing business with them. The prices are great and the customer service was beyond amazing! They made us feel like family! We will be lifelong customers now and I can’t thank y’all enough for everything!

name: Jessica Martin
text: Highly recommend Diamond Depot! They are super friendly and easy to work with. Most recently, I had an issue with the band of my wedding ring. They fixed it right up, cleaned it and polished it and it looks stunning! Just as pretty as the day my husband bought it!

name: Rachel Dunkle
text: My twin daughters passed away prematurely and I wanted another band made with their birthstone. Terry made it happen and it turned out perfect!

name: Weston McBrayer
text: Great place to buy any jewelry! Great staff and great prices! Always friendly and helpful with whatever you need! 10/10

name: Jodie Little
text: I used them to get a ring appraisal and they were fantastic! Very friendly staff and made sure I got the best price available. They have a great jewelry selection with beautiful diamonds and gems. I definitely recommend for any jewelry needs.

name: Warren Turner
text: I’ve had two rings that had not only monetary value but tremendous sentimental value repaired and the work was flawless and reasonably priced. Highly recommend this jeweler.

name: Tina Michelle
text: Id def recommend this place. Very helpful in my hubby and I getting the set we like.

name: Ruth Kendricks
text: I'm very pleased with Diamond Depot in every way. Excellent job on my jewelry and staff were friendly and helpful. I'll definitely be using them from now on and highly recommend everyone to go there.

name: Christina Gaither
text: Exceptional customer service! Even stayed open after closing hours to let us shop! Thanks there’s no piece of jewelry more precious than wedding rings !

name: Corey Gordon
text: Wonderful service. Felt welcomed as soon as I walked in the door. Will very much so recommend.

name: Stacy Gordon
text: Diamond Depot can make a lady's dream come true. A wonder selection of beautiful jewelry. Amanda and Lisa make you feel at home shopping with them and will spend as much time with you picking out the right piece. I broke my right and thought it was unremarkable, Terry worked his magic and fixed it to perfection!!! Thanks you guys!!!

resp.text: Thank you!  Merry Christmas !

name: William Williams
text: Very nice, helpful and patient.  Took a lot of extra time to help us find what we wanted.

name: Eric Jarvis
text: Top notch service. Answered every question and were patient while looking around. Would recommend to anyone in search of jewelry!

name: Lenny Wood
text: Amanda at the front was so nice and helpful. Fast repairs and fair price. Satisfied customer.

name: Yudith
text: Great place to buy diamonds with a very high quality. Amanda is very polite, respectful, sweet and understand perfectly all her customers needs. Absolutely a jewelry to come back.

name: Paul Griffin
text: To say that I know nothing about jewelry is an understatement. So obviously I was intimidated when I started my search for an engagement ring. My coworker suggested me to go look at Dimond Depot. I had shopped around at several stores up to that point. After meeting with Amanda I immediately knew that they had my business. The ring I chose was not typical but that made no difference. After searching for the right stone for a few weeks they brought in a beautiful emerald. I was blown away. Not only did they find such a high quality stone. They had it set and sold to me at an incredible price. Everyone I came in contact with at the store was happy to be there and that took all the stress out of the process for me. I can't recommend them enough. Dimond Depot in Oxford is the best place to buy jewelry hands down.

name: RODNEY GREGORY
text: Again my experience with Diamond Depot was a wonderful buying experience. Especially Amanda, and the rest of the personnel was very concerned about showing me every option to meet my need. My wife and I recommend Diamond Depot to our friends and family. Diamond Depot is always our first choice to locate what we are looking for!

name: Eric Burgess
text: Couldn’t be happier about my experience at Diamond Depot. Everyone was so helpful and kind. I really felt like they cared about me having a good experience while picking out an engagement ring. Both my brother and my cousin also got their ring there, and they also had great experiences. Great service and great people!

resp.text: Eric, thanks for the comment.  We appreciate you and your family and we look forward to being a part of it for YEARS to come!  Merry Christmas and see you soon!

name: Phillip Amason Sr
text: Awesome experience! Great selection and pricing! I’m typically not a “first stop” buyer but after a few minutes with Amanda and finding the perfect ring we knew we were ready!

name: Brook Thompson
text: Such great customer service and they have more options than you would expect!

name: Darla Cotton
text: Went in and immediately felt welcomed!! Both employees took time to help me find a unique gift for a unique person!! Will keep them in mind for future purchases. Found out they also they do in store jewelry repair never send out anything so no chances of my jewelry getting lost 😊

name: Tommy Ardis
text: The help with my selection was very appreciated. Was not sure what I was looking for but it was like you could read my mind. Thank you so much for your patience with me and your excellent help. I will be recommending you guys. Again thank you

resp.text: We love being mind readers :)   Thanks for making it easy...we have the best customers!  Thanks again!

name: Donna Bryant
text:
I absolutely love Diamond Depot. They turned a wedding band into a heart for my granddaughter. They did an amazing job.
They are very friendly and helpful. I will definitely continue to do business with them

resp.text: That Heart is so beautiful, cute and we hope she loves it for years to come!!  Merry Christmas!

text: I love going to Diamond Depot, I have had a ring made, jewelry repaired and they have the items repaired quickly. The staff are awesome. They treat you like family. Would not go anywhere else for my jewelry needs.Merry Christmas.

name: David Nahay
text: Everyone at Diamond Depot was amazing. It's obvious they love what they do and also really care about their customers. Give them a try. You won't regret it.

The timing and pricing were the best I found in the area! Overall, they created a good experience and I would definitely be a return customer for an appraisal or purchase.

resp.text: Thank you Sarah! If  we can help you with anything else at all, please let us know!

name: Denise Jones

Just picked up a necklace they repaired for my Mom & it is so beautiful!  They repaired & cleaned it & it looks brand new.  They have a great supply of items to choose from & such great quality.  Also very reasonable prices. I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Lynn Shafer
text: Great repair work!  I love my beautiful ring.

name: David Kiel
text: Great service, friendly people, prompt work all the time. I take all my work to them.

name: Lucretia Bean

Several other Jewelers told me it could not be sized. So it sat in a special case hoping one day it would fit. When I spoke to Amanda she said she thought they would be able to size it. Just bring it in and they would see. I found out that the reason my ring didn't fit was because I was sold the wrong size. Amanda sized the ring, sized my finger and checked to make sure none of the stones were missing. She was so polite and professional. I felt so comfortable with them I even gave them my engagement and wedding ring to be cleaned. Amanda did the same thing checked to make sure I wasn't missing stones or had loose stones. I got my rings back today and I am so happy with them. Diamond Depot is definitely where's all my jewelry will go in the future. And I already have my eyes on my next Anniversary present. Thank you  Diamond Depot for doing such a spectacular job on my rings!! Thank you Amanda for making my experience easy and fun.

name: Joseph Mogill
text: I brought my watch in to get a new battery. The customer service was friendly, but they were unable to complete the service due to “not having a piece to close the back.” Since it was a “high end” watch, they needed to send it to a company for 2 weeks + $20. Didn’t seem right so I decline and they didn’t charge me for the new battery they gave me. I left with a bag full of watch parts. Later, I realized the gasket was damaged, I was missing parts, and with a battery that doesn’t work. This watch is a standard Tissot, and doesn’t need “special” parts to change out batteries. I will send my business elsewhere.

resp.text:
Hi Joseph.  In the 1000+ Watches we work on yearly, we do occasionally have a watch repair that requires a higher level of service than our on site Watch Repair shop feels comfortable offering. In those instances, we send the watch to our repairman in Texas, whom we have worked with for years, and they will repair and send back to us. The service is excellent and the pricing is very affordable for our customers.

Out of all the watches we have replaced a battery on this year, yours was the only one that we needed to send off for further inspection. The reason was because of a damaged gasket (so it appeared) - but certainly it was beyond our comfort level of repair locally. Rather than continue to work with it locally, we felt the need to move it to a higher tier repairman so that we could offer the best service on your watch. Your response was that you had someone in Georgia who has worked on it before and could put the back on with the gasket, no problem. You seemed as if it was no problem and we assumed that was the case.

It appears that there your repairman in Georgia saw a similar issue that we did - that there was still a problem.   Our repairmen would have had no issue providing the service that was needed to complete the task but I understand that you didn’t feel comfortable with us taking care of the problem for you further. I’m sorry you felt that way.  We certainly do everything we can to provide a level of service that makes people feel comfortable with allowing us to take care of them from start to finish. I believe, as you can see by the reviews, that we have always done our part to make things right and offer a service that ends with satisfaction.  While you may have felt uneasy about letting us finish the repair for you, I do not believe we have any type of reviews or history that would warrant that feeling from you. Instead, I believe it’s just the opposite - that we have a proven record (shown on reviews) of making sure all of our customers are fully satisfied and we work hard to maintain this level of service.

Either way, we are sorry you were unable to do business with us and see our service through to the end. But we wish you all the best.

name: Michelle Whitelaw
text:
I cannot say enough wonderful things about Diamond Depot. I had a loose diamond that I wanted to incorporate into a unique engagement ring. I work in Atlanta, so I decided to visit a well known jewelry designer in Buckhead. She was very knowledgeable, but had her own idea for the ring, and didn’t seem to listen to what I wanted.  Frustrated and disappointed after our third meeting, I decided to scrap the whole project.

When explaining the bad experience to a friend, she mentioned that Terry had recently designed an engagement ring for a relative which turned out beautifully. Since I live in Oxford, I figured I didn’t have anything to lose so I dropped in one day to check it out. During our first meeting, Terry really took the time to listen to me, made notes and offered suggestions when I asked for them.

Over the course of the design process, I completely changed what I wanted, but Terry and Amanda were very patient and encouraging. When I decided that I wanted side stones, they arranged to bring in three sets for me to view with my diamond to find the perfect match.  After I received the original CAD rendering, I realized that there were a few things that I wanted to change. Each suggestion was promptly incorporated into the design and a new CAD rendering sent.

I was able to pick up my finished ring on Christmas Eve, and it was more stunning than I had ever imagined. Even though this was a custom design that involved a lot of personal service, the price for the setting was very reasonable.  I have worked with various jewelers on other projects and I can say without a doubt that Terry and Amanda’s design capabilities and professionalism are the best I’ve experienced. Thank you guys for a beautiful, one-of-a-kind ring!!!

resp.text: Michelle thank you!  I hope you're enjoying that beautiful ring!  If we can help you with anything at all, please let us know!

text: My husband and I purchased our wedding rings from Diamond Depot over three years ago and I have never had any problems with my ring. The diamonds are secure (never been loose or fallen out) and not to mention beautiful! I have had soo many compliments on the unique style of my ring and people think that my husband spent way more than he paid for the ring. My husband and I do not in any way regret purchasing our wedding rings from Diamond Depot. We had a great experience there and I highly recommend Diamond Depot. :)

name: Marci Bradley
text:
On the approach of our 5 year anniversary we decided to upgrade my wedding ring.   I am a flight attendant and have honestly looked everywhere.   Funny Diamond Depot was right in my backyard.    We live about 40 minutes away in Ashville, AL and well worth the drive.  Much closer than Atlanta or Birmingham.  Amanda our diamond consultant was INCREDIBLE!!!   She has an awesome personality and was so patient with listening to our needs and wants.   Amanda’s knowledge was also helpful.  We ended up special ordering my ring and could not be happier. Just WOW! LOVE IT!  The Oweners were there as well and adds the nice family atmosphere.   I think it is important to support small local businesses, but We got to do this and get the best service and quality we were looking for.  Their prices and customer service are not beatable.  We have found a local jeweler that we will recommend to anyone! Near or far.
THANK YOU Diamond Depot!
Thank you Amanda, & Terry for all your service!
Don and Marci

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful comment!  We are so thankful for the most amazing customers!  We appreciate you so much!
